name: ❤️ COMFY, CUTE, CONVENIENT, 舒適可愛,方便,新裝修 - Unit A
summary: If you’re looking for a clean, affordable, and convenient accommodation in the heart of the Hong Kong action then look no further. This space offers all the amenities one could need on a holiday including clean bedding with extra sets provided, a bathroom stocked with hygiene essentials, and a kitchen with everything you need to whip up something delicious. The location could not be closer to the action but you’ll still enjoy peace and quiet within the apartment.
space: This adorable apartment is newly renovated and incredibly modern. The chic design utilizes all the space in the apartment in a way that is aesthetically pleasing and fully functional. This bright accommodation provides everything you could need for a positive and memorable stay. The charming atmosphere of the space will have you feeling at home in no time. The apartment is decorated with bright colors and has a homey feel. Natural sunlight floods the apartment during the day creating a bright and charming mood. The curtains will keep the light from flooding in if you wish to sleep in. The apartment is also exceptionally tranquil as no street noise penetrates the space. You can relax and recharge in peace in this cute and cozy apartment. You’ll definitely feel clean and ready to take on the city when staying in this accommodation. The shower is first-rate with hot water and solid water pressure. Clean towels are provided for your comfort and convenience. Shampoo, soap, toilet paper, a h

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the Kowloon area. This apartment is located in a lively and happening entertainment district. Kowloon has an interesting history and is never short on things to do with endless restaurant, bar, and entertainment options. No matter what you’re interested in doing Kowloon will provide you with ample activities to fill your time.  Restaurants Above and Beyond – This restaurant lives up to its name as it offers a breathtaking view of the Hong Kong skyline, fine wines, and Cantonese cuisine. If you’re looking for a delectable dinner and night on the town check out Above and Beyond. Harbourside Intercontinental – This is not your average buffet. Located directly on the harbor and offering an array of mouth-watering dishes from Asian to Western fare, this is a restaurant that has something for everyone.  Temple Spice Crabs – Located on Temple street market, no trip to Hong Kong is complete without trying your fair share of street food. Enjoy cold beer and scrumptio
notes: Check-in time is anytime that is convenient for you after 2p.m. and check-out time is before 11a.m.  The check-in process is convenient and hassle free as guests can check themselves in using a keypad.  Luggage drop off is allowed for guests that arrive earlier than check-in time or depart later than check-out time.  This accommodation is not suitable for children under two years old or pets. Smoking inside, parties, and events are not permitted. If you are looking for a long-term accommodation in Hong Kong and enjoy your stay at this apartment, you can rent the space for a long term stay. Please let us know in advance if you require the use of a baby cot
transit: Getting around the city from this accommodation is a walk in the park, almost literally! You can walk to beautiful Kowloon among countless other intriguing destinations. Within walking distance there are ample restaurants and bars, a 24-hour supermarket, hookah lounge, and massage places. The MTR (Mass Transit Railway) is just a short ten-minute walk from the accommodation. The MTR is very useful and serves as a great option for getting around Hong Kong. Tourist passes for the MTR are available online. Taxis are also an option for getting around Hong Kong and are usually metered.  Taxis in Hong Kong are relatively cheap compared to other major cities around the world.
access: Guests have access to many amazing amenities when renting this space. Not only is there continuous access to WIFI, there is a workspace that you can utilize to work form your laptop for all the digital nomad travelers. There is a living area complete with cushy bean bags and cable TV. The building is equipped with an elevator so you won’t have to tackle any stairs after exploring the city. The apartment is air conditioned. You can get cozy and clean as the host provides all necessary bed and bath essentials. The bedroom comes with clean bed linens as well as extra blankets and pillows. There is a hot shower with excellent water pressure. Clean towels, toilet paper, soap, and shampoo are all provided. You will also have access to a hair dryer and hangers to ensure that you and clothing are looking fresh. The kitchen is fully prepared for you to cook delicious meals. The kitchen provides a refrigerator, stove, dishes, silverware, pots, pans, cooking oil, salt, and pepper.
interaction: James is an incredibly cordial and responsive host. He has a 99% response rate and typically responds to messages from quests within an hour. The host speaks both English and Chinese so there is no need to worry about a language barrier. James is happy to help with any questions, recommendations, or directions.

host.host_about:
I am a yoga teacher from New York City. 
I also have lived in Taipei, Taiwan, and Hong Kong. 
I have used airbnb as a traveler and host. I am respectful of other people's spaces and hope people also respect my space. I will try to help with any directions and recommend you have a wonderful time. 
Thank you.

reviews.comments: 国庆期间入住,价格非常划算,空间比旅馆的房间大的多,还有个小客厅可以摆放自己的物品,洗漱用品比较齐全,就是如果有拖鞋会更完美,牙膏只给了一小支,我跟我朋友只能珍惜着用,房东是说英文的,全程交流还是比较愉快,有问必答,房东非常好人,我退房前一晚上发烧根本没睡好,原本说好11点半左右退房的,房东说要是想休息多一会可以让我们1点退房,实在是太好人了!房间位置是在尖沙咀地铁口七八分钟的路程,或者可以坐公交到香港科学馆站,下车200m就到了,公交会省力一点!楼下有药店､7-11､不远处还有24小时超市,再走远点就是商业街,很便利!下次来过夜会再订这家!
Good value !!

Extremely responsive host. He is friendly and polite. Space were just as accurate as photos. Room location were accurate as well, few min walk from either Jordon or Tsim sha shui station. And around the area there were shops to look around. Smooth check in as instruction were clear. Very value for room like this in such location.
Clean rooms and very good showering facilities. Great that there were two sets of towels for a three night stay. Appreciated that. James was fast to respond as well!
Everything is fine, the facilities are good. The room was bit smaller than we imagined. However the lord is very patient:)
在香港,这个价格很不错啦,不过床有些小,但是也够两个女生睡了,还有枕头太高了｡地理位子很方便,很多地方都可以直接走过去,好评!

We really enjoyed our stay. Good location and the space has a thoughtful layout. Appreciated the charging cords and tv hinge and divider door.
HOWEVER the bed is not a real bed. James needs to put a real mattress on the bed. A 1 inch mattress topper on a plank of wood is not a bed. We have just finished travelling all over the world over the past year and this bed was the worst! 
Everything else in the space was so good! We hope James fixes this vital part to make it an outstanding Air Bnb apartment in Hong Kong.

it has a really good location, convince stores and restos are all within reach. James is extremely helpful and can reply to messages quickly. One small stain is that the room is a bit tiny but it's in hk and everything is expensive haha. 
btw the soundproofing is not that good, light sleepers need to pay attention when decide to reserve. 
ill recommend this room to you.

James' place is right in the middle of TST and has very easy access to nightlife, shopping, etc. Walking to TST MTR station is about 8 mins but a much shorter walk to lots of restaurants, bars, malls, etc. Even though it's in TST, there's little noise (besides that of neighbors) but still a very quiet location. The room is a bit small which is to be expected since you're staying in the city. Bed has a very hard mattress which was fine for me since I'm used to it, but something to note!
首先我要谢谢james 非常的贴心 我问了他一句有没有拖鞋 告诉我没有之后 我也没放在心上｡没想到晚上直接给我们买好了 太贴心了吧!地理位置还是算蛮方便的 离地铁站十来分钟吧 房间的话也干净｡在寸土寸金的香港 这个大小我们也有心里预期啦 装修也不错~唯一的遗憾的就是热水问题 洗澡要洗快一点 因为过一会水就不热啦~整体还是很不错的~
Very quick response host, nice location. The room is big enough for 2 compared to many other rooms.

Great place, real value for money, especially considering the location! As my first ever AirBnb I didn't really have much expectations as I didn't have any experience, but this was a great experience over all. Everything was provided and the place was (very) clean and roomy enough for an entire week for two people. Thanks James!
Great location in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, the unit was clean and comfortable. James was a good host who was quick to respond to any queries I had. I would definitely stay here again.
感谢James哥哥对我这个路盲的认真指导,刚好在圣诞节前后来港,周边酒店基本都订满,幸好能找到这家很好的民宿｡照片和实际入住时看到的一样,位置也挺好找的,距离地铁站很近,周边也有很多吃的,非常方便｡而且房间用品一应俱全,对比住快捷酒店,性价比挺高了~ 下次来港如果有朋友需要会继续推荐的❤️
The home is worth its value. Its size is fair by Hong Kong standards. I absolutely love its location, very strategic!
交通便利,設備齊全,環境舒適
房源不错,推荐｡

Location was great. MTR Tsim Sha Tsui and Jordan stations are only a couple mins walk. The place was sparkling clean with all necessary amenities. Check in and out was a breeze. Communication with the host and co-host was super clear and fast.

I highly recommend this place!
The location is very good, basically you can walk to the place you want. two people live relatively warm, cost-effective
Great place to stay! It's spacious and the location doesn't get much better than this!
地理位置很好,尖沙咀的韩国街上,去铜锣湾,海港城,中环,旺角之类的热门地区都很方便,香港寸土寸金,房间性价比很高｡
Great location. The place is tidy and clean. It's close to the busiest area in HongKong but yet it's pretty quiet. Recommend it!
Comfy place for 2 persons with strategic places and near to the attractions and stations
不知道该怎么说了,热水大概只够洗好头发,这个太坑了,洗冷水澡伤不起,卫生间如果可以有个窗户就好了,其他都还好房东回复很快
普通でした
Great place to stay! Highly recommended...
Nice place yo stay, very quick rely,good location!
位置在金巴利大厦,周围韩国人较多,房间还算好找卫生间没有干湿分离洗手池较小,希望房东准备一个置物架,这样不用把熨斗这些放在床下了｡

장점
- 조던역과 침사추이역의 사이로 위치가 매우 좋다.
- 경비가 따로 있어서 보안이 좋다.
- 여행간 시기에 가격 대비 위치가 제일 좋았다.(3인기준)
- 비밀번호라서 열쇠관리가 필요없어서 편하다.
- 바로 앞에 편의점 있고, 웰컴마트도 있어서 편하다.

단점
- 침구류에서 한방냄새가 난다. 큼큼
- 3인 묵는데 수건이 부족하다. (2인은 괜찮)
- 화장실이 불투명 유리벽이라서 실루엣 보인다.
- 따뜻한 물이 어느정도 나왔다가 안나오고 차가움과 미지근함의 사이의 물이 나옴.

(색각복닥 벽록익엑옥 작막작멱 각식곡 옉믹학멱 빅축익닉닥)

친한 친구랑 가는 여행 + 2인 + 가격대비숙소 = 추천합니다.
Best.

Perfect location in HK. I would especially recommend this space to backpackers and people travelling around Asia. It is close to some great restaurants especially the Scarlet Cafe and Wine Bar. There is also a superb Craft beer bar around the corner if that is your thing!

space: The apartment is perfect for your Montreal getaway: quiet, bright and warm. You have access to everything: - High speed Internet - TV connected to the Internet and Netflix - Fully equipped kitchen - Comfortable double bed - Office for working - Mini private terrace to chill in peace

reviews.comments:
Merci pour votre réactivité! En effet, j’ai pris cet appartement en urgence le matin même. Étant avec mon petit chat, je devais absolument arriver avant 15h. Ils n’ont pas hésité pour m’accueillir directement. Le nettoyage a été fait parfaitement malgré le manque de temps. Je les  remercie pour leur professionnalisme :) 
L’appart est vraiment chouette, près du parc Lafontaine. On s’y sent très bien.
Appartement agréable et bien situé. Olivier est un hôte réactif et attentif.

Très beau appartement, bien entretenu! La déco est très très chouette! La communication a toujours été A1! Bien que le métro ne se trouve pas à côté, nous n'avons pas eu de la difficulté avec les déplacements. La seule chose qui serait à améliorer serait la connexion WiFi.. Pas la plus vite, cela nous a empêché de faire une petite soirée relax Netflix, mais nous avons profité autrement :-)
On le recommende!!!!

I spent three nights in this apartment, and liked it very much.
The location is near a big park, and it took me about 15 minutes to walk to the nearest metro station. A supermarket can be reached by a short 3 minute walk.
Entrance to the apartment is from a street level door, and the apartment is one floor up, reached by a staircase inside the building.
The apartment itself felt a bit like home. The wooden floors are creaky and a little bit worn in places, but not a problem at all, at least for me. There are also a few minor drops of paint on the floors, but again, not really a problem. The furniture is generally comfortable and the bedroom mattress is relatively firm. I really appreciated the light blocking curtains and blinds in the bedroom. I was not bothered by traffic noise from the street during my stay, and found the place quiet. What I also really appreciated about this apartment is how clean it was: Absolutely spotless! Also, communication with my host was flawless! Needed a hairdryer and got a reply immediately. And the hairdryer was delivered very soon after. And I got the same fast response and delivery when I couldn't find a can opener.
All in all,  I was very glad to stay in this apartment, and impressed by my host's swift and positive replies to my requests.
I would be glad to stay in this apartment again the next time I vist Montreal.

Le logement était très bien et très propre tel que présenté dans l'annonce. Les clients que j'avais relocalisés dans le cadre d'un tournage ont été satisfaits du lieu. Quant à moi, la communication avec l'hôte fût exemplaire et il fût très accommodant. Merci Antoine!

Hôte disponible et impeccable. 
Endroit bien situé
Propre
Apart sympa et très bon accueil de nos hôtes. Lit confortable et ferme, bonne pression d’eau, bien situé. Merci encore de nous avoir accueilli!

We had a wonderful time in Olivier´s apartment. The location is perfect, walking distance to all the great restaurants, cafés and bars in Le Plateau. Supermarket 5 min walk. The apartment is cute, warm, clean - I´d stay there again! I had a few questions before my arrival and during my stay and he replied immediately. Such a great find!!! Merci.
Olivier's place is very quiet and it is not too difficult to find free parking. The only thing I wish it had is a washer/dryer.

We stayed at Olivier’s apartment to celebrate NYE in Montreal for about 5 days and it was perfect for my husband and me. We are from SoCal so we never get the cold temperatures that Montreal has so it was really nice that Olivier provided the apartment what it needed to stay cozy. The location was great as well pretty close to Schwartz which we ate at like 3 times. The communication was great and Olivier was always quick to respond. Thanks for letting us celebrate 2019 at your Plateau place.

Je suis restee chez Olivier, 15 jours : Du 16 fevrier au 1er Mars. Ce sejour fut une catastrophe, de pire en pire chaque jour. L'appartement d'Olivier n'est pas du tout adapte pour rester en Hiver. Des que les temperatures etaient froides, plus de chauffage: 16 degres dans l'appartement alors qu'il faut -20 dehors !!! Pour resumer mes aventures, hormis, ces 15 jours passes dans le froids (ce qui est deja insupportable): Une trappe au plafond etait ouverte sur l'exterieur, les rideaux de la chambre tombent, la douche fuit, la television ne marche pas... Bref un sejour des plus catastrophique. J'ai bien sur demande a quitter les lieux plus tot mais Olivier n'a pas souhaiter, malgre les circonstances, me rembourser.. Tres mauvaise exprience, je ne le recommande pas !

name: 1tnf SUPER GREAT LOCATION IN BARCELONA!!!
summary: Nice bright and sunny spacious "Acomodis" duplex apartment located in central Barcelona, in Poble Sec in a very nice and safe neighbourhood. This is a nice and special "Acomodis" duplex apartment in a perfect location in the city!
space: Welcome to Barcelona and to "Acomodis" apartments! If you contact us we'll answer you to confirm availability and to give you more information. The price is set according to the number of people, number of nights and season. IDEAL QUIET LOCATION IN THE CENTER OF BARCELONA CLOSE TO LAS RAMBLAS Come discover why this is a lovely and unique "Acomodis" accommodation which will offer you not only a comfortable stay but also a nice experience in Barcelona if you want to be part of the “local scene”. In the past the building was an industrial factory and then a school. Since 1999 there are several apartments in the building with nice neighbours and our "Acomodis" apartment is a nice place for our guests who want to visit Barcelona. Highlights of the area: close to the centre of town, near Plaça Espanya and the Magic Fountains of Montjuïc, Poble Espanyol. *OUR HAPPY GUESTS are mature and young couples, families with older and young children, groups of friends and solo travelers. *WE OFFER OUR

Highlights of the area: close to t
neighborhood_overview: HAPPY NEIGHBOURHOOD Paral.lel and Poble Sec are barrios included in the district called Montjuïc. Paral.lel is an avenue that cuts down from picturesque Plaça Espanya right down to the World Trade Centre at the tip of the port. Poble Sec is an area spreading out from the middle of Paral.lel. The areas are safe and primarily residential but there is much entertainment to be had as well. This includes popular bars, theatre and even a club. However, whilst Paral.lel is a busy thoroughfare during the day, the areas are quiet and just a 10-20 minute walk to the centre of the city and Las Ramblas. A good choice if you want to be central but away from the crowds of tourists that populate more central areas. Montjuïc and Plaça Espanya are also very close by. The event halls and the Palau de Congressos near Plaça espanya also make the (URL HIDDEN) Poble Sec area perfect for those in Barcelona on business. Although both Plaça Espanya and Montjuïc have a lot to offer tourists as well. There are s
notes: As you will be staying in a fully touristic licensed "Acomodis" apartment There is a tourist tax of 2.5 cent per adult per night, this needs to be paid on check in please. Children under 17's are free.
transit: The "Acomodis" apartment is very close to the metro station "Paral.lel" (green and purple lines). They go directly to La Sagrada Familia, Camp Nou and Parc Güell. If you come by car let us know to give you updated information about parkings in the area.
access: You'll have full access to the "Acomodis" apartment. It'll be all yours for your stay.
interaction: We'll be on hand to help in any way we can.
house_rules: - No smoking in the apartment please  - The kitchen is of course available for your use, please be safe.  - Reasonable quiet noise levels especially after 21pm. - Respect of the property and neighbours.  - No loud parties. - With the hot weather we would really appreciate if you could clean down kitchen surfaces at least once a day (only if used) and bring out the garbage at least every second day. This is necessary in the hot weather, thank you! The garbage bins are located very close to your apartment - near the main front door. They are the big grey plastic containers - you can't miss them! Cheers!  - Most importantly relax and enjoy your stay! RESPECT FOR NEIGHBOURS. As the apartment is very quiet, for the centre of Barcelona, or any part of Barcelona, for that matter, I ask visitors to be mindful of noise levels. ON ARRIVAL:  - There is 150€ security deposit hold with credit card.  - Late check in (21h to 9h) has an additional fee of 35 euros. - City tax not included in the price.

host.host_about:
We are Happy Aurora and Happy Jacob!
We have 3 happy daughters, a happy Beagle and a happy fish!
We offer a wide variety of apartments ideally located in Barcelona. These apartments are perfect for your vacation! Book our apartments and, if you want, enjoy our superb cooking classes followed by a complete Spanish meal. That's a great experience!
We speak English, French, Spanish and Catalan. 
We are happy because we like what we do!

There are a big furnished bedroom with a huge window, a modern kitchen fully equipped, a toilet, a big bathroom and living room with a hight quality Italian sofa bed.

name: Secret deal New cosy APT 3pax 1min MTR/subway
summary: Conveniently located in front of MTR station (subway) in the famous district of Jordan my cosy apartment can fit 3 people, in a safe and quiet building. It is newly renovated in a fresh and modern style, you will feel really comfortable! There are big shopping malls, delicious restaurants and a lot of street food all around my building, you only need to walk a few minutes ^^ ♡Add my studio to Wish List♡

reviews.comments: 地點方便且離地鐵站近,附近機能完善,房東親切的提供住宿各種需求,在寸土寸金的香港來說,有個簡單舒適的空間可做適當休息｡
房间的地理位置超级好,走到机场大巴站和地铁站都只要几分钟的时候｡房东非常热心,介绍尖沙咀附近美食｡
Friendly host with a great location

Booked her place quite last minute due to previous Airbnb owner cancelled and Mia along with his group of listings.

It is very close to Jordan Mtr exit b1, building is just across Ocbc and diagonally opposite Yue Hua.
Room is located on high floor in a building with quite a number of hostels. There are 3 lifts serving the block, 2 serving her level while 1 serves alternate levels.

Her place is small, as expected like other place in Hong Kong. But amenities are completed with mini fridge, tv, cups, electric kettle, plenty of towels, pillows, blankets and shower gel/shampoo. Electronic door lock is installed, so we don't have to worry about losing the keys. The queen bed mattress is very comfortable and air-conditioning is adequate for us during October(it's quite a warm October for us) I slept on the sofa bed while my parents slept on the bed. There is no separate dry area in the showers due to the tight space. Heater is working but needs abit of getting used to.  I managed to make it work properly after some tries(it's those 2 hot/cold knobs type) Overall, it is quite comfortable, despite the small space for 3 pax. More recommended for 2pax. Very value for money during October convention period. Thank you!
房间位置非常好,去哪里交通都很方便房东姐姐人很nice,下次去还会入住这里｡

Extremely convenient location, Jordan MTR exit was just across the road. Room was small but nothing unexpected since it is Hong Kong. Host was very responsive, assisted us in check-in personally, and also checked on us throughout our stay. Would consider staying again if I travel to Hong Kong in future.

The room is well-equipped though it’s small as expected. The bed was so comfortable and soft. The host has swapped the room with another listing which was fine for us but could be better if we were informed earlier. The location was good, just next to Jordan mtr station. There are many famous eateries like Australia dairy co and Yee Shun Dairy co, less than 5 min walking distance. Overall we are happy with the room.
Ao’s place is top-notch deal in Kowloon. The location is perfect, and the place is amazingly clean and tidy.

host.host_about: Born on Kauai, the owner of our company Joshua Rudinoff started Kauai Exclusive Management in 2008. Since managing a single property Kauai Exclusive has grown to well over 100 properties island wide and we now have a full time team dedicated to Airbnb.  We love to host our Kauai Exclusive guests with professionalism and aloha. We are always available at 877GOKAUAI (someone is in the office 24/7) and happy to help in any way we can.

reviews.comments: Amazing vacation in Kapaa. Wife wife and I, we had a wonderful time in this Condo. There is basically everything thing available regards kitchen equipment. The pool is quite big and there was always enough space around the pool to find your private spot. Thanks again to Josh for the opportunity to rent this Condo!

Beautiful, clean condo with all the amenities you’ll need. The grounds and pool of the complex are exceptional and very well maintained. Having two grocery stores right across the road made getting supplies very convenient. Joshua was great letting us know what to expect and giving us the info we needed. Always responded to any questions quickly as well.   Location was great but traffic could be highly congested on the main road so needed to leave extra time getting anywhere.

We stayed in March 2018 and very much enjoyed our stay. The condo is very spacious and clean. The place is very quiet at night and the King bed was very comfortable. As we were traveling with an infant, Joshua was able to provide us with a pack and play at a small surcharge. The large kitchen was very useful for preparing meals.
Having two grocery stores across the street is also very useful. There are also some restaurants across the street, and the main area of Kapaa is just a 5 minute drive away. There are also numerous beaches nearby.
We would recommend staying at the Waipouli Resort, especially for families. Joshua was always very prompt in responding to questions.

This condo was an amazing space. Extremely clean, from the bedroom to the kitchen, which had everything we needed to cook, even cupcake tins! It was located right across from the grocery store and right next to the courtyard mariott which was the same price per night and had no kitchen and wasn’t nearly as beautiful. Easy access to Netflix at night. The AC worked extremely well & and the bed was very comfortable. It was easy to book and quick responses with minimal interaction. Truly felt like home. Would absolutely stay here again, I even extended my stay when I was here! Also the pool was great. Loved it.

Thanks Josh & the team.

summary: 房间位于九龙尖沙咀中心区弥敦道及加拿分道交界,香港地铁九龙线尖沙咀站D1､D2出口(加拿分道出口);上盖的美丽都大厦,出站步行只需叁十秒便可到达大门口｡大厦旁就有来回直达机场的A21机场巴士站;有来住香港红磡火车站(中港直通火车总站)的81C､87D巴士站,罗湖火车更可直达尖沙咀东火车总站,从尖东火车总站M2隧道(地下通道)出口右边便是美丽都大厦｡宾馆附近观光旅游景点丰富,步行约十分钟便到达香港文化中心､ 维多利亚港､名人手印星光大道､尖沙咀码头及中港码头等｡ 穿梭香港九龙办事､购物､探亲､观光都非常方便

PS:房間內沒有炊具配備,不支持房內烹飪.毛巾.浴巾.枕頭和被子的數量根據房型配備,如需增加數量需要額外加收費用.床單.被單.枕套為一客一換,如需每天更換需要額外加收費用. 【免費寄存行李服務】入住時間為下午2點,退房時間為次日中午12點(我們需要在您退房之後做保潔,將房間整潔的準備給下一位要入住的客人),入住當天提前到達或退房後我們均可提供免費寄存行李服務,退房後行李寄存時限為退房當天的下午18:00之前. 【关于出行】下訂單預訂經過我們確認訂單,付款之後我們都會統一將如何來到我家的具體路線及我们的详细地址.联系电话发送到您的郵箱.入住的當天您直接到达出示身份證件報名字,交納200元港幣的入住押金即可辦理登記入住,退房返还. 我們有專人每天負責接待每位客人的入住和退房的辦理手續.還有負責房間清潔的專人每天打掃房間衛生,確保客人每天都保持潔淨舒適的住宿環境. 尖沙咀是位于九龙半岛南端,面临维多利亚港,与香港岛的中环隔海相望｡这里有香港必去景点星光大道､维港,是大型商场林立的购物天堂,也是科学馆､艺术馆齐聚的文化中心,在这里可以度过充实的一天｡ 主要景点 尖沙咀有着很多著名景点,星光大道,维多利亚港,《重庆森林》取景地重庆大厦,天星小轮和九龙公
neighborhood_overview: 尖沙咀是位于九龙半岛南端,面临维多利亚港,与香港岛的中环隔海相望｡这里有香港必去景点星光大道､维港,是大型商场林立的购物天堂,也是科学馆､艺术馆齐聚的文化中心,在这里可以度过充实的一天｡ 主要景点 尖沙咀有着很多著名景点,星光大道,维多利亚港,《重庆森林》取景地重庆大厦,天星小轮和九龙公园, 购物天堂 尖沙咀是九龙最著名的高档商业区,拥有dfs全球免税店､海港城､sogo等大型购物商场,也有lv､prada 文化中心 这里还有香港历史博物馆､香港科学馆､香港太空馆及香港文化中心等文化场所,设施先进,寓教于乐,是亲子游的好选择｡  特别提示  1. 逛尖沙咀建议选择平底舒适的鞋子,避免高跟鞋｡  2. 商铺上午通常开门较晚,可避免一大早前往购物｡  3. 特色街上人很多,逛街时候还需注意安全｡

summary: 房间装修风格为日式风,星星灯的布置让您度过浪漫的夜晚｡房间干净整洁,客厅有超大落地窗,采光极佳｡我们会为您提供免费的牙刷､沐浴液､洗发水｡浴巾､毛巾及床上用品均一客一换并进行专业杀菌洗涤｡厨房有厨具可进行简单的烹饪,美好的一天从早晨开始:)

reviews.comments: 房子装修的很漂亮,也很干净卫生｡里面还很贴心的放了冰柜,可以自费喝冷饮,很不错的哦,推荐来深圳准备去香港的小伙伴选择此房源｡
很好,很好,喜欢,会再选择入住这里｡
挺好的房间,住起来很舒服,很干净,楼下吃的很多,交通也很便利｡房东人很好,推荐入住!
房东人特别好,而且很贴心,回复很及时,我去的早,房东早早收拾好我就入住了｡房间和图上一样,很温馨很好看~~入住体验特别好,周边也很方便
旅途总需要好的民宿来释放一天攒下来的疲惫再消化吸收今天的故事    坐立于春风路罗湖火车站附近,人民南地铁站不到一百米｡   楼下便是小食街,若是到了傍晚小楼便可闻到阵阵食香,置身于人间烟火之中｡   站在民宿的窗边感受深圳晚上的车水马龙,却又不用感受城市的喧嚣,空间独立舒适｡  老板四掌柜的服务态度超级好哟,且冰箱自备酒水,付款更是超级简单呢   这次旅程超级满意的,超乎意料的体验呢~
房間很棒 而且去金光華廣場很近
离地铁一号线走路十分钟,很方便,楼下就有KFC,旁边是新银座｡掌柜人很好,我们飞机晚点,半夜十二点才到,他也等到我们入住才休息,真的感到非常抱歉!!舞姿很漂亮也很干净,临马路,睡觉要把窗户都关上,还有不喜欢高的枕头的可以跟掌柜说,我入住太晚就没有再打扰掌柜,人很热情,及时解决问题,推荐!!
住的体验比预想中的要好,东西很齐全,交通也很便利
房间风格很日式,是我跟男朋友喜欢的类型｡地理位置也挺不错,国贸站走过去不远,还可以逛金光华广场还有很多牌子 哈哈,客服有问必答,还很贴心,最后忘记拿充电器了,客服很耐心的帮我解决了问题｡总体很不错哒｡

房間整潔 地理位置十分方便
房東回覆快 有禮貌
总体不错,位置很方便去香港,周边设施齐全,房东很热情,值得推荐
房间氛围炒鸡棒!虽然离马路不远但是隔音效果特别好 入住当天没登APP房东小姐姐挺着急我们找不到地方的哈哈哈 位置特别好找 房东小姐姐也炒鸡可爱 整体卫生和体验都非常好 房子设计得特别棒 大厦有保安24小时值班 我们上楼还会询问 特别安全 非常棒的一次体验√
Good location and clean
房间很有格调,所处位置十分便利,挺不错的,值得选择｡

房源跟图片中差别不大,位置好找,隔音效果挺好的,复式设计还不错,洗手间跟浴室分开赞一个!
位置挺好找的,离罗湖火车站不远,但是如果从罗湖出来的话,没有直达的地铁｡房间布置挺好的
四掌柜消息回复特别快,而且有什么小问题他都能很快回复并给出解决方案｡在深圳的两晚住的很舒心,房间里的星星灯特别好看,卫生环境也很好｡如果还有机会,还想住四掌柜的房源
挺好的一间,位置还不错,在立交桥旁边但是不吵,走500米就到金光华,吃饭shopping都很方便,描述也和图片相一致,就是电视打不开,应该是我不懂怎么接线哈哈哈哈哈哈

不错的选择,去香港的建议可以走路过去,很近的｡地铁站出来后记得过马路兜桥底就可以到了｡很方便｡

Damla is a nice and caring host,her apartment is really new,beautiful and spotlessly clean.In turn you have almost all kind of shops and restaurants and Metro-Bus station a 2 minute walk from the House,i recommend this property the following guests!
Damla,thank you so much for evrything and we hope to see you again!!!

Damla's place if perfect for accommodation near Ataturk Airport.  Easy by Metro/metrobus 200 meters away.  Shopping and restaurants all just outside on the pedestrian street.  The apartment is bigger and more comfortable than I imagined, especially for European standards.  Comes complete with everything.  Radiant floor heating was especially nice after being out in the cold and rain.   Check in was easy once I found it from her detailed instructions.  Sorry we did not meet with her. I hope to stay again when I need a place in that area.

The apartment features a modern interior with quality kitchen and bathroom appliances, wide-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, A/C. Very bright and cozy. The building is located in the family-friendly & quiet neighborhood and is steps away from the most lively area with many famous tourist spots.

name: Superbly Located 3 Bedroom Apartment
summary: -Fully-furnished, professionally designed apartment -Convenient & central location. 99-Walk Score. In the heart of the Plateau -Walking distance to key attractions & neighbourhoods (Mile End, Little Italy &   Le Plateau) & countless shops, restaurants, cafés and bars -High quality mattress & fresh linens -Fully stocked kitchen -Designer bath products -Fully renovated
space: High end furnishings with everything you need and you are steps away from Laurier Metro station (5 minutes walk) and from many beautiful parks and great restaurants. The apartment is located on the second floor of a typical Montreal apartment building. Once inside, it's all on one floor.
description: -Fully-furnished, professionally designed apartment -Convenient & central location. 99-Walk Score. In the heart of the Plateau -Walking distance to key attractions & neighbourhoods (Mile End, Little Italy &   Le Plateau) & countless shops, restaurants, cafés and bars -High quality mattress & fresh linens -Fully stocked kitchen -Designer bath products -Fully renovated High end furnishings with everything you need and you are steps away from Laurier Metro station (5 minutes walk) and from many beautiful parks and great restaurants. The apartment is located on the second floor of a typical Montreal apartment building. Once inside, it's all on one floor. Complete access to all areas of the apartment as well as the TV, Netflix to make you feel right at home! Since we use a self check in system, you don’t need to worry about check-in, flight delays or arriving later than planned.  You’ll also arrive to an apartment fully stocked with our essentials starter kit including; coffee, sugar, salt
neighborhood_overview: -Located in one of Montreal’s most desirable and practical locations of Le Plateau. Lots of little artisanal shops, cafés, restaurants, parks and markets -Walking distance to amazing restaurants (Must try Milos, Mais, L'Express, St-  Viateur Bagel, and Kazu), bars (Dieu du Ciel) and coffee shops. The Grocery store   and convenient stores are less than 150m/yards away  -Less than 16 km/10 miles from Trudeau International Airport -10 minutes to downtown
notes: There’s a parking lot at 448 Roy E, just 10 min walking distance. There’s also metered street parking and some limited free street parking on the streets parallel to St-Laurent.
transit: WALKING: Central and convenient location BICYCLES: Take advantage of BIXI – Montreal’s bike sharing system. Take a bike when you need one, and leave it at any station when you arrive at your destination.  BUSES: Next city bus stop that will take you to popular neighbourhoods and common places of interest.  TRAINS: 5 min walk to Laurier subway station (orange line) TAXIS/UBER: Never more than a few minutes wait  PARKING: Paid street parking or 500m from a secure lot.
access: Complete access to all areas of the apartment as well as the TV, Netflix to make you feel right at home!
interaction: Since we use a self check in system, you don’t need to worry about check-in, flight delays or arriving later than planned.  You’ll also arrive to an apartment fully stocked with our essentials starter kit including; coffee, sugar, salt & pepper, olive oil and home essentials such as toilet paper, paper towels and laundry soap.  Montreal is a beautiful city and I want to ensure your experience everything it has to offer. I take pride in my guests having an amazing experience when they stay in my apartment so just remember, I’m always a phone call or text message away.
house_rules: - -Please be respectful to neighbours - -Quiet hours as of 11pm. - Parties will not be tolerated. The security deposit will be claimed if any problem occur

host.host_about:
I have recently left my full time position in the corporate world to be a full time host so I can better my work life balance as a new mother to a very active baby girl! 

I now work with the most amazing team managing multiple locations in Montreal's charming Little Italy, historical Old Port and scenic Mont-Tremblant.

I'm an avid skier and traveller who loves Montreal and it's surroundings. When I am not in Montreal's Jean-Talon market area you can find me on the picturesque Mont-Tremblant mountain hitting the slopes! Another favorite is a night on the town in the always action packed Old Port right by the Notre-Dame Basilica.

I love meeting people from different parts of the world and I look forward to connecting with you as a host or traveler. I will do my best to make your stay as comfortable as possible or being a good guest, depending on my role.

reviews.comments: Great location, sparkling clean and responsive and gracious hosts. The apartment is equipped with everything you might need plus a large assortment of clean fluffy towels. Highly recommend.

We stayed one week in Anna-Isabelle's place. The place has been recently renovated in a very modern and practical style and all amenities are new and in very good taste. It is a bit noisy as you hear the neighbours and the street so best to sleep in the back bedrooms if you are sensitive to that. The location is great, 5 minutes from the metro station and an "épicerie" (small supermarket) and lots of great restaurants around. Small outdoor market with organic products on Sundays at the metro station. We had a few questions about the place and it was very easy to communicate via (Hidden by Airbnb) with the host.

Nicely decorated and newly renovated apartment in the heart of Mile End, walking distance from Mont Royal Park, trendy shopping district and Laurier metro station. Very practical with complete kitchenware and comfortable with cosy bed linens. Easy communication with owner. Made our 2 weeks stay in Montreal wonderful.

We had a lovely time! We booked the space for our team for a business trip and were happy they were able to accommodate us.  The place is as advertised, great location, super comfortable and had a warm touch, responded quickly to messages and were very friendly. Highly recommend for personal as well as business travel.

The apartment is stylish, comfortable and impeccably clean. Location is a perfect launching point for restaurants and shops in Mile End. It was also a quick trip to all other areas of Montreal that we were visiting. We thoroughly enjoyed our experience and would definitely stay here again.
Great experience
Cozy, clean and comfortable; great location, great communication.

A great apartment in Montreal! This is an awesome location, great value for the neighborhood. The apartment is well equipped and clean/functional. Be aware that the sound proofing isn’t amazing, but it’s a pretty quiet neighborhood. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
This place was amazing! Location was perfect, and the keypad on the door made things super convenient when our group split up.
Great place!  Good location!  Do not hesitate to book!!!

Logement propre et calme. Bien situé (proche de commerces,du métro et du Mont Royal)
Nous recommandons cette adresse pour un séjour à Montréal

beautifull appartement !
great place be, perfect !

name: SPECIAL 2b/2b at the Beautiful Tropical Aina Nalu!
summary: An unbeatable location. Aina Nalu is located in the heart of historical Lahaina town, two blocks from Front Street where you will find restaurants, shops and art galleries, also walking distance is the famous Banyan tree and Lahaina Harbor where Snorkeling, Fishing and Whale watching tours depart. The resort features two pools, one a Balinese saline infinity pool with a separate large Jacuzzi spa, large open air poolside pavilion, several private cabanas and gas grills.
space: 2B/2B condo upgraded and meticulously mantained under new ownership and management.  King size bed in master bedroom, Queen size bed in guest bedroom and also a new queen size sleeper sofa in the living room. Two spacious stone walk in showers, flat screen TVs and air conditioners in every room; fully equipped kitchen with everything you need to enjoy your stay. Conveniently located in the first floor, no steps.
description: An unbeatable location. Aina Nalu is located in the heart of historical Lahaina town, two blocks from Front Street where you will find restaurants, shops and art galleries, also walking distance is the famous Banyan tree and Lahaina Harbor where Snorkeling, Fishing and Whale watching tours depart. The resort features two pools, one a Balinese saline infinity pool with a separate large Jacuzzi spa, large open air poolside pavilion, several private cabanas and gas grills. 2B/2B condo upgraded and meticulously mantained under new ownership and management.  King size bed in master bedroom, Queen size bed in guest bedroom and also a new queen size sleeper sofa in the living room. Two spacious stone walk in showers, flat screen TVs and air conditioners in every room; fully equipped kitchen with everything you need to enjoy your stay. Conveniently located in the first floor, no steps. Easy Self Check In with a Smart Lock.  Before your arrival we will provide you with an individualized 6 digit
neighborhood_overview: You can't beat the location ---  It is just a 10 minute walk to the 505 beach where you and your family can take surfing lessons and a 5 minute drive to "Baby Beach"  which is great for young children!  Also from Aina Nalu you are only a 2 minute walk to a grocery store where you can get the best poke on the island and close to banks and post office.
notes: Our prices are including the GET and TAT (Transient Accomodation tax) That is 14.42%  of savings for you.   Parking at Aina Nalu is $20 per day, this is payable at the property front desk the day of your arrival, they will provide you with a parking pass,  parking is spacious and very close to the unit, you also have the option to park across the street for $15 or free on Waine'e street.  We provide our guests with iron, ironing board, hairdryers in all bathrooms, hotel-quality towels and linen, beach towels, chairs, boogie boards, cooler and a starter supply including: coffee, paper products, trash bags, laundry and dish detergents, soaps and hand soap, shampoo, conditioner and lotion.
transit: You can walk to almost all Lahaina attractions, although a rental car is recommended for exploring other sites on the island. From Aina Nalu you are only a 2 minute walk to public transit. A $4 day pass takes you anywhere you want to go on Maui, including the airport There is a $20/day parking fee for on site parking. Parking on the street is free.  Complimentary WIFI is available in the condominium, at both pools and in the lobby/select common areas.
access: Easy Self Check In with a Smart Lock.  Before your arrival we will provide you with an individualized 6 digit code that will remain active until you check out. You will have access to all the pools and grills in the building
interaction: All your interactions will be with Lilla, she is in charge of providing you with answers to all your questions through text or phone. She lives close by the unit and speaks English, German and Hungarian.

host.host_about: Maui resident for 24 years, now I live in San Diego but I come back to Hawaii every 4 months for business.  I'm committed to provide you with a great stay at my new place.  Since most of the time I am not in Maui, my friend Lila is my on island contact, she holds a real state license, has experience with hosting and is super kind, she will be in contact with you for any inquiries.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Place was amazing!  Great location and wonderful amenities!
Victoria’s place is lovely. Great location, and very clean. Would recommend!
Lovely apartment in the heart of Lahaina with two beautiful community pools . Perfect location for any day trips and evening getaways. Easy checkin and communication!

The condo was wonderful. It was amazing being so close to downtown Lahaina and being able to walk rather than drive all the time. The condo was spacious, clean, and very accommodating to people like us who like to cook and bbq. I'd recommend this place to my friends and family and would definitely stay here again.
This place is great! Walking distance to Front Street and all the shops and restaurants there. The place itself is nice and clean and large. Highly recommended!

The unit was great! We didn't realize how great a location it was until we got there and was able to walk down the block to Front Street. There was a list of recommended things to do/eat/see that were great for the downtime we had. We would definitely stay here again the next time we're in Maui.
If you want to experience Lahaina, you couldn’t ask for a better location.

name: Cozy 3bed/2bath w/balcony close to Sagrada Familia
summary: Welcome to our home! Our three bedroom apartment, in the vibrant area of Gracia, is a modern and comfortable place to stay with wonderful transport links. You’re just a doorstep away from Sant Pau's metro Station and a block away from famous Hospital Sant Pau and Av. Gaudí!  Enjoy the beautiful balcony, the amazing local life and the spacious common areas. Explore the neighbourhood and enjoy this bustling part of Barcelona! We hope you have a lovely time and enjoy your stay.
space: Welcome to our home! We are delighted to open up our three bedroom apartment to fellow airbnb travelers. Our flat is spacious, with a discrete and modern decor and a relaxed feel, located only a block away from the wonderful Paseo Gaudí and the Hospital Sant Pau. It’s the ideal place to come back to after a day of exploring Barcelona, great transport links mean you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle!  The living area is bright and airy, with a large, comfy sofa, a super comfortable armchair, and flat screen TV, so sit back and make yourself at home! Wood flooring, a gorgeous balcony, large windows and an integrated dining area with a table that sit four in comfy chairs add to the room’s charm, and soft throws and pillows make modern finishing touches.  Enjoy a fresh beverage in the balcony while making your plans around the city! This is our favorite place in the house, make yourself at home with family or friends.  You’ll find everything you ne

Enjoy the beautiful balcony, the amazing local life and the spacious common areas. Explore the neighbourhood and enjoy this bustling part of Barcelona! We hope you have a lovely time and enjoy your stay. Welcome to our home! We are delighted to open up our three bedroom apartment to fellow airbnb travelers. Our flat is spacious, with a discrete and modern decor and a relaxed feel, located only a block away from the wonderful Paseo Gaudí and the Hospital Sant Pau. It’s the ideal place to come back to after a day of exploring Barcelona, great transport links mean you’ll be right in the hub of the city but able to escape the hustle and bustle!  The living area is bright and airy, with a large, comfy sofa, a super comf
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Gracia, which is a charming and elegant neighbourhood in the center of Barcelona. You will enjoy the best of catalonia’s modernism by walking through its streets, shops and cafés and get astonished by Gaudí’s most beautiful works such as Casa Milá or Casa Batlló, iconic pieces of this genius architecture. You will be only one block away from the famous Hospital Sant Pau, also a masterpiece from Gaudi, with its astonishing exposed-bricks construction and the charming Paseo Gaudí, one the most beautiful streets in Barcelona to enjoy walking, as no cars are allowed and plenty of shops, bars and restaurants offer the best of the local food throughout many terraces. Verdi street is also one of the most popular streets and is very close by, you can also make a special time to pay a visit it.  You will be located in an centric well connected area, with the city’s finest restaurants.
notes: You will be required to present your ID/Passport upon arrival. In order to follow local regulations and to be able to register all our guests on the local police’s database, we will have to take pictures of ID documents for all guests. I hope this is not an inconvenient!
transit: You couldn't be at a most fine location! Sant Pau (L5 blue line) is the nearest station to the apartment, just a doorstep away. Literally, you will only need to step out the door and you will face the tube station! This connects you to the blue line, meaning you can get to iconic Barcelona sites in no time at all, such as the Basilica of Sagrada Familia (15 minutes away) or even the beach, which is only 20 minutes away. There are also plenty of buses around the apartment such as the V21, that stops just two blocks away and that will take you all over the city with the best connections. Try the paella or the super hot patatas bravas in the amazing Restaurante Azul or enjoy some spicy and exotic delicatessen at Restaurante Peruano Andino, only two blocks away down Av. Gaudí.  You will enjoy this neighborhood very much, we are happy to welcome you to it! Getting in and out of the airport is also very easy, as there is the Airport Express, a bus that stops in Plaza Catalunya and that will
access: You will have access to the whole property. We live in a caring community, please keep in mind that it is paramount that we are kind and respectful towards our neighbours.
interaction: My friends at Hostmaker are looking after my home while I am away; they are a short-lets management service team who know Barcelona like the back of their hand! I trust them to look after you and give you a warm welcome! If you have any questions about your stay, please get in touch through the channel platform.

neighborhood_overview: Gávea ist eine tolle Nachbarschaft im Süden der Stadt Rio De Janeiro, Brasilien. Befindet sich zwischen den Hang der Hill Brothers und dem Westufer der Rodrigo de Freitas-Lagune. Sie haben eine privilegierte Lage mit Blick auf den Corcovado Berg und Zugang zum Strand von Leblon im Süden, den Botanischen Garten, im Norden und der Wald von Tijuca im Westen. Im Jahr 2000 wurde seine Lebensqualität Index auf 0970 geschätzt; Rio De Janeiro erreichte den 1. Platz, unter den 126 Nachbarschaften
notes: Für Gäste gibt es Handtücher, Bettwäsche und Decken. Es werden weiße Handtücher, Bettwäsche und decken, die sauber riechen den Gästen zur Verfügung gestellt.

name: Comfortable large single bedroom for female guests
summary: Our home near Sydney Olympic Park, is close to bus stops, marketplace, medical centre and multi-cuisine restaurants. We are looking for friendly, tidy female guests for short-term stays.  The single bedroom has an adjacent shared bathroom/toilet. The east-facing well lit room has a comfortable bed, study table, built-in wardrobe and ceiling fan. Walk through the recycled backyard garden  with veggie patches, worm farms, compost bins, native beehives and see a home biogas system in action.
space: The room, on the top floor of a two-storey house, has a leafy outlook. It has a single comfortable bed, a desk with lamp, a side table and ceiling fan. There is a mirrored wardrobe for your clothes and bags. The adjacent bathroom has a bathtub, toilet, vanity unit and shower recess. The bathroom is shared with my aged mother who lives in another bedroom.
description: Our home near Sydney Olympic Park, is close to bus stops, marketplace, medical centre and multi-cuisine restaurants. We are looking for friendly, tidy female guests for short-term stays.  The single bedroom has an adjacent shared bathroom/toilet. The east-facing well lit room has a comfortable bed, study table, built-in wardrobe and ceiling fan. Walk through the recycled backyard garden  with veggie patches, worm farms, compost bins, native beehives and see a home biogas system in action. The room, on the top floor of a two-storey house, has a leafy outlook. It has a single comfortable bed, a desk with lamp, a side table and ceiling fan. There is a mirrored wardrobe for your clothes and bags. The adjacent bathroom has a bathtub, toilet, vanity unit and shower recess. The bathroom is shared with my aged mother who lives in another bedroom. Besides your bedroom and bathroom, you have access to the kitchen facilities, lounge and backyard. We are mostly available in the evenings after 5pm
neighborhood_overview: Newington started as the Athletes village during the Sydney Olympic Games of 2000. It was built as a green suburb with solar power and greywater recycling. There are bike paths to the sporting complex of Sydney Olympic Park and beautiful surroundings of wetlands, mangroves, lakes and parks.
notes: Newington has no railway station and you would need to take a bus from Strathfield or Parramatta or Sydney Olympic Park to get here. There are limited buses at night, last bus being around midnight.
transit: The house is close to bus-stops from where you can get buses to Strathfield, Sydney Olympic Park or Parramatta stations for rail links to the rest of Sydney. You can also take the bus or walk (about 20 minutes) to the nearby ferry wharf for a lovely journey to the city along Parramatta river. There are limited bus services late in the night. Ample street parking is available for cars. You can use our bicycle for short distances such as visiting the Sydney Olympic Park.
access: Besides your bedroom and bathroom, you have access to the kitchen facilities, lounge and backyard.
interaction: We are mostly available in the evenings after 5pm on weekdays and home most weekends. We go to bed around 10pm and would appreciate quiet after this time. You must inform us if you are going to be back later than this hour. We respect our privacy as well as yours but at the same time would love to help you out with making your stay comfortable and smooth.
house_rules: 1. Guests are expected to clean and maintain their rooms (bedroom and bathroom) in a tidy state.  2. If kitchen/laundry facilities are used, please tidy up after use and wash the dishes/utensils when done. We are happy to provide some space in the fridge to store your food. Microwave, oven and gas is available for basic cooking / heating. 3. Dirty laundry should be placed in the laundry basket provided and you can use the washing machine when required. There is a clothes line in the backyard but you can also be provided with an internal drying line for rainy days. 4. This is an environment-friendly household. Please use water and electricity wisely, for example ensuring at least a near-full load for laundry, switching off appliances at the power point after use, taking short showers etc. Please recycle appropriately.

host.host_about: We are a married couple with one daughter, now empty-nesters. I am interested in all things sustainable and environmental and our living reflects this philosophy. My husband loves making movies but he works in risk management. We like a quiet,unhurried life where there is time for reflection and creativity.

Jyoti and Uttam's home is a lovely home in a quiet, friendly neighbourhood. Before I even reached the house, locals in the street gave me warm hellos! I had a car and parking on the street was no problem. A lovely location near Olympic Park, super close to Newington shops, cafes, restaurants. 
My room and bathroom were very very generous and homely and my stay was perfect and relaxing. I am really happy to have stayed with some a warm, welcoming family. A wonderful AirBnb experience!

reviews.comments: If your looking for a place to fully relax, hear the sea from the comfort of your bed or get up early and see the sunrise on the beach. Then this is the place for you. We had a lovely couple of days and Anne was a great host and gave us loads of lovely treats for our stay. My little boy loved playing with the toys and we loved the peace and quite.

Anne was extremely generous and helpful, and a wonderful host.  The apartment is lovely, light and bright with everything I needed, and more, such as a very comfortable bed and a great shower.  Lots of morning sunshine and night-time ocean waves - my favourite go-to-sleep sound!  And exactly as the description says, it's just a few minutes easy stroll to the beach which is fabulous, even in the middle of winter.  The neighbourhood was peaceful with cafes and shops only 5 minutes away.  I absolutely loved my time at Neiafu and Newport, and can't wait to return.  Thank you so much Anne.

Neiafu is an excellent choice! In a wonderful location, a minutes walk to the beach and a few minutes to great cafes, restaurants and shops. Close to transport, yet very quiet. We had a fabulous time there. Everything we needed was all there. Delicious treats, the Sunday paper, great shower, comfy bed and beautiful Italian sheets.  Anne is a lovely, welcoming and helpful host. Not one complaint!

We really enjoyed our stay at Neiafu, it was a great weekend... Anne was very helpful and lovely, with the smallest of touches that made our stay even more memorable, like cookies and chocolate when we arrived, breakfast cereal and snacks left out and having an early/late check in/check out.

Her place had a real homely feel, very comfortable and the bed was soft and gave us a good night sleep!

This was our first airbnb experience and we would highly recommend her place for everyone to stay at... We only live in Neutral Bay so not far from Newport, but coming just for the night felt like we had got away from the hustle and bustle and we found it so relaxing, peaceful and quiet! 

We went on a little adventure on Sunday and found an amazing beach to just chill out at, so topped the weekend off nicely!

We will definitely go back in the future ;)
Great place to stay. I wish I had planned to stay longer..
A great place and we had a great stay. The hostess is very friendly and very quick to respond to our request. In addition, the apartment is clean and meets the pictures. A definite recommendation!
Wonderful beachside self-contained apartment. Great access and beautifully presented. Thank you again.

Wonderful 10 days in Newport! Thanks Ann and Ron for a warm welcome in their cozy house. They are very friendly and easygoing people. Their place really became my home during my vacation. It was so comfortable and easy. Newport beach is 5 minutes away. There are so many beautiful places around as well. In their house I found everything I needed to spend my time comfortably. I hope to spend my next vacation there as well.

We had a wonderful time at Neiafu! Everything was so easy and well-organised, clean and tidy, Anne and her husband were very friendly and welcoming and they even put out some food for us and gave us some great advice about the area. I would love to come back!

We were very happy with the location of Neiafu and loved being so close to restaurants, shops and the beach.  The apartment was clean and bed comfortable;  Andi had left lots of provisions for our stay, including a Xmas gift under a tree!  Beach towels were a welcome touch too.   Unfortunately, Andi and Ron were away when we arrived leaving us unsure of access areas.

Leider war unsere Erfahrung im Neiafu nicht so erfreulich. 
Der von der Gastgeberin per E-Mail (nicht aber über Airbnb !) stornierte 3. Tag unserer Buchung wurde bei Ankunft nicht komplett von ihr erstattet, obwohl ich sie im Vorfeld mehrfach darum gebeten hatte, über das Airbnb-System zu stornieren, damit alles seine Ordnung hat. Als ich sie um die korrekte Erstattung bat, sagte sie, wir könnten auch gleich wieder gehen, sie habe die Preise erhöht und wir könnten froh sein, es zu dem Airbnb-Preis bekommen zu haben. 
Nach dieser Diskussion war die Atmosphäre für uns so unerträglich, dass wir keinesfalls Sylvester dort verbringen wollten (abgesehen davon, dass die Wohnung nicht besonders sauber war) und am nächsten Tag das Zimmer wieder geräumt haben, natürlich ohne eine Erstattung ihrerseits. Wir hatten durch diese Buchung leider nur Ärger und doppelte Kosten. 
Zur Unterkunft: Küche m. kleiner Lounge im Erdgeschoss, recht dunkel und m. Tür zur Gemeinschaftsterrasse. Küche voll eingerichtet, Kochutensilien und Geschirr vorhanden. Müsli, Milch, Butter, Marmelade und Croissants standen auch bereit.
Oben sind Bad und Schlafzimmer m. Tür zur Terrasse der Gastgeberin.
Wenn man keine großen Ansprüche an Sauberkeit und Privatsphäre hat, ist es durchaus passabel und nicht weit zum Strand und in den Ort.

The place was lovely and cosy! Just as described. It was in such a great location - close to the beach, shops and tennis courts! Highly recommend for weekend getaway! Anne was so sweet and even left us chocolates, snacks and breakfast. Thank you!
Clean and nice place. Good hosts. Very close to the beach. All you need really

Anne's place was perfectly adequate for a one night stay in Newport although the place we stayed in is not the same as the photographs. We were also unsure which of the areas we could access as the flat is attached to the main house. But we appreciated the snacks that were left for us and the apartment was clean and tidy.

My partner and I enjoyed our short stay at Andi's Neiafu unit 2.  It was clean, well set-up, comfortable and welcoming unit.  Kitchen is fully stocked and lounge area downstairs had all that we needed. The queen size bed was comfortable and bathroom (shower) is located upstairs. The bathroom is on the smaller size but works for the place. Perfect for a couple or a single traveler who wants to chill out. There are also some lovely places to sit outside and it has a tropical beach feel about it. Additionally, it was a pleasant surprise to have little treats and breakfast items left for us in their kitchen area. We wished we had more time to explore the area as our stay was a short one. Bottom line, I recommend this place and hope to stay here in the future again.

My wife and I were met by Ron who showed us the way to the property. It was clean and comfortable with a lounge/kitchen downstairs and the bathroom/bedroom upstairs. 

The hosts provided us with a range of fruit, cereals, juice, milk and some pastries which was was more than enough for our one night stay. There were plenty of books, DVDs and board games also available which was great!

Note that it this is not a separate property, but part of the hosts' house. However, it is reasonably isolated and was fine for my wife and I. The location is very close to Newport Beach and Barrenjoey Road with its bevy of cafés and restaurants. Also, the property we stayed at was different to the photos but we would still recommend it!
Place was great. Very good location, nice and easy to access.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Neiafu! It was exactly what we were after. Peaceful, clean, quiet, and close to everything we needed. Will definitely stay here again if we're ever in Newport. :)
lovely very easy to deal with thank you

We stayed in unit 1 at Neiafu, which is the unit shown in the photos above. The area was quiet and beautiful, and as described it was a very short walk to Newport Beach and to local amenities (cafes, supermarkets, restaurants, etc.). Our hosts were friendly and the food left for us was much appreciated, and saved us buying breakfast items for our 2 night stay. As noted by previous reviewers there are 2 units that are rented out, and the outside areas shown are communal for all guests staying on the property. Thank you for a pleasant stay.
Great as it was previously thank you
Chocolates, croissants, fruit, eggs, drinks and spreads, dvd's, books, maps, games, all very comfortable and an easy walk to the beach and shops in a nice street with trees. We loved it.

We had a lovely stay at Neiafu. The unit is well appointed and provisions including cake on arrival were much appreciated. Location is excellent being quiet yet close to Newport Beach and the Newport shopping area with it's numerous restaurants. The bathroom is quite small and a bit awkwardly arranged but everything else very functional. Hosts were lovely and arrangements went smoothly.

The neighbourhood very quiet and everyone we meet were extremely friendly.
Anne went out of her way to leave lots of goodies which were much appreciated.
Our stay was very comfortable! The place was very nicely presented and welcoming. Thoroughly enjoyed and would highly recommend.

Wow! Talk about a super host... It only begins to describe Andi's hospitality.

From the minute I arrived she made me feel like I belonged. The apartment has everything you would ever need plus plus plus!

A 2 minute walk to the beach... 5 minute walk to some fabulous cafes and restaurants... you couldn't get more central.

The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in and the pillows were great!  I could just have easily stayed in bed all weekend if the weather wasn't so lovely.

I will definitely be back!

I booked this apartment for my stepdaughter and her partner to stay in when they arrived from the UK. It was perfect - private, comfortable, convenient, very close to the beach, friendly hosts who were very accommodating. Would recommend!
The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Unit 2 is in a great location but we were very disappointed with the poor level of cleanliness in the bathroom & kitchen.

We stayed in Unit 2, which is a different place to the pictures - it should be noted that this unit has a staircase, in case that may be a problem. Despite it being a different place, we enjoyed our stay and the location is absolutely fantastic - we left our car in the street and just walked around Newport for our 2-night stay. There's a great community feel to the area. Appreciated the fruit and breakfast items left out, as well as some choccy and a couple of beers! :)
A lovely experience once again. Anne and Rob are fantastic hosts. We loved every bit of our stay. It’s a nice area that we’ll be coming back to many more times.

Anne is a genuinely lovely lady and a great host. Very generous with her time and local knowledge.  We were travelling with our young son and she had a cot and high chair, as well as a basket of toys which made all the difference!

The flat is really well located near to Newport Beach and we were able to borrow a sun umbrella and boogie board. 

It’s quite compact but perfect for one or two people wanting to get away from the city for a few days. We were able to get there by bus directly from Sydney.
Great location close to Beach and Newport centre!
Great relaxed location. 2 mins walk to Newport beach / town and 15 min walk to Newport arms. 10 min drive to palm beach. Perfect for a weekend away.

A great place to visit for a little beach holiday on Sydney's Northern Beaches. Well away from the City hustle and bustle a short stroll to the beach. Great public transport if you need to get to the City, Manly, or even further North to Palm Beach. Andi is such a wonderful host and the place is so comfortable, quiet and relaxing!

The location of this airbnb is just perfect. You can walk to town, to the beach - the neighbourhood is quiet, and the people are really friendly. Feels like a proper getaway from the busy city life. Perfect space for me, my partner and our little puppy dog. Highly recommend.

This host cancelled same-day of my check in as they wouldn't accept dogs even though their listing I'd pet friendly and instantly bookable.
Left stranded in Sydney, she also fraudulently asked me to cancel the booking at my end to appear that the guest cancelled and not the host.
Why? Because she would receive the cancellation fees.
Even went to the point of telling me she had contacted Airbnb and they advised her I was to cancel!

Beware of this dodgy operator.

Many others out there who are honest and operate with integrity

Comfortable accommodation in a great, quiet location, 5 minutes walk to downtown Newport and the main beach.  Private guest suite with well equipped kitchen and separate entrance.  Excellent bed and large pleasant bedroom.  The food Anne supplied made for a generous breakfast and lovely home baked treats were very welcoming.  Thank you for offering a great place to stay.
Great location, hospitality and  quick response. It takes only few minutes walk to the beach. We really enjoyed it.

The treats and fruit were really lovely. Minuit's from beach and shops, very good hosts, would recommend. The parking was on the street but it was not a problem. We had our Egyptian Mau cat with us and it all worked really well. Thank's Anne and Ron and Happy Christmas to you and your family.
Cheers Lyndie
An amazing location with a very comfortable and homely stay. Brilliant location just a few  minutes walk from beach and town. Great stay!
Great location, very homely! Comfortable bed and great food supplied for breakfast. Overall very satisfied.
Welcoming hosts who are very thoughtful.

Had a great stay here. Very quick and informative responses to messages and questions. Description in ad very accurate. Literally 2 minutes to a great beach. 5 mins max walk to shops/cafes.  15 minute walk to other side of Newport. 
Thank you Anne.
Excellent location. Short walk to beach and cafes/shops. Perfect for a wkd away. Very welcoming hosts.
Lovely host and nice little place, very well located in Newport. Excellent value and so close to the beach. Would stay again.

Great place
Mike's place is in an excellent location, walkable to everything you need. Place is a bit smaller than it appears in the photos.

I stayed at this apartment for 13 days. The location was amazing, 3 minutes walk to the metro and within a minute's walk to local coffee shops and convenience stores. space: The modern furnishings in this home sets it apart from many of the short stay lets in Bondi and the room is set up purely for guests with your own wardrobe, spare linens, a mass of fluffy pillows and towels as well as snorkeling masks equipment to explore the local beaches.

transit: It’s really easy to get around from the apartment. The bus stop is 50 meters away to take you to Bondi Junction, the city or to delights such as Watson’s Bay.  Even better, the famous Bondi to Coogee walk starts right outside which is a great way to explore the coast and take advantage of that fresh sea air.  There is also street parking and cheaper car parks nearby.

I would highly recommend Bondi suite to anyone wanting a personalized hotel stay without the expense.

name: Large sgl rm close to shops/restaurants/transport.
summary: It is a single size bedroom. The accommodation is about one minute’s walk to University of NSW, shops, restaurants and transports. It is a very wide and quiet street with pleasant surrounding. There are ten different buses running along the main road, Anzac Parade. There are at least fifty restaurants, ten cafes, two bars and many supermarkets. The tenants in the house are mostly university students and some tourists. They are easy to get along. This is a vibrant prestige suburb.
space: It is a spacious house with very big backyard.  The room is fully furnished with one single bed, one desk, one chair, fan and build-in wardrobes. There is unlimited usage of cable broadband internet. Share facilities such as washing machine, oven, fridges and microwave, etc. The house is very clean. It is a quiet street.

neighborhood_overview: The name of the suburb is Kingsford, which is a vibrant suburb. It is where University of NSW is locating. It is ten minutes by bus to Fox Studios, Sydney Criket Ground and Centennial Park, five minutes walking to Prince of Wales Hospital. The main road is Anzac Parade.  There are at least 50(yes, fifty) restaurants at the main road, Anzac Parade, serving Western, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Thai, Indian, Indonesian, Malaysian, Singaporean and Vietnamese food, etc. There are about 10 cafes and 2 bars. Besides, there are McDonald, Subway and Oporto restaurants. It is a food lovers’ heaven. The neighbouring suburbs are Kensington, Randwick, Rosebery, Matraville, Daceyville, Mascot, Pagewood and Maroubra, etc.,
notes: The tenants in this area are mostly college students. During summer vacation, most of them have gone back to their countries for holidays. The price have been heavily reduced during vacation. It is the best opportunity to take advantage of the discounted price. It is economical single room. It suits tourists on low budgets.
transit: The accommodation is one minute walking distance to University of New South Wales, shops, restaurants and transports at the main road, Anzac Parade. reviews.comments:
Суперхозяин!!!
Всем советую остановиться у Мусы, если Вы решили посетить Стамбул!)))

Eh walla! I don’t know where to start from.. This stay was so special at so many levels. 

I ended up at Musa’s place because my previous host cancelled the booking while I was boarding my flight to Istanbul,  which happened to be the best part of this trip. 

Musa responded very quickly, and he even gave a discount. Throughout my stay Musa and Halim were very attentive and thoughtful. Not to forget their beautiful cat, Chizik! 

Though They are students but still their place is very clean and stylish. Very close to everything you need. Like literally everything. 

Transportation: Taksim Square/ Metro is 4-5 minutes walk away. The Tram (FINDIKLI Mimar Sinan University) is like 5 minutes by walk too.. Taxis are also available throughout the day and night near the main road.

A grocery store and fruit shop is right outside the home. And some food/Restaurant are available 24hours. They can actually get things delivered at anytime in the night too.. even their kitchen has all amenities for using.. 

To whom ever it may concern, If you are planning to go to Istanbul and If you are reading this, don’t think twice. Contact Musa now. You will enjoy your stay. 

PS: They are learning English but communicating with them was so easy. They really make effort to make your stay comfortable. Just ask them if you need anything, they’ll get it done.. And their kind intention is to make friends and learn about different cultures while they whole heartedly welcome you as their guests.. Enjoy!

Guys! Çok çok teşekkur ederim ! Take care and see you soon.. 

Cheers!
Areeb..

The price is the best, the appartment very comfortable, you have everything you need and more. The hospitality of the Host (Musa) is outstanding, he basically made me feel at home and was the best turkish person I met in Turkey so far. Totally recommended! Nothing to complain about l! Thank you!!

Such a kind, friendly and accommodating host. Perfect location just a few minutes walk to Taksim, and warm friendly atmosphere. This is more than just a place to stay, its a home to come back to with friends who are willing and active to engage.
Musa is a great host. I spend a very nice holiday in Istanbul. a great Location !
Musa is super friendly, kind and helpful I felt like I knw him for ages I rlly felt like home
The place was really good and in a central location. Musa was  really cool and very helpful. Would recommend 10/10
Musa and his mate gave me very warm welcoming. The bathroom is clean, the room was clean. What should be changed is to include less people in the apartment and a roof light bulb. Thank you again.

host.host_about:
Somos unos apasionados de los viajes. Tanto, que ¡nos hemos convertido en profesionales! 
Estamos muy orgullosos de haber empezado alquilando apartamentos en Barcelona a viajeros nacionales e internacionales. Llevamos más de una década alquilando apartamentos a familias, grupos de amigos, parejas... y realmente siempre ha sido una experiencia muy gratificante para nosotros. Cuando viajamos con nuestros niños, o cuando podemos escaparnos un fin de semana solos, es la opción de alojamiento que más nos gusta. Tenemos independencia, comodidad, conocemos muchos anfitriones nos enriquecen con sus historias y consejos sobre la ciudad y vivimos la ciudad casi casi como un local más.

Nos gusta sentirnos a gusto cuando viajamos, por eso es lo que intentamos ofrecer siempre a nuestros huéspedes. Tenemos un pequeño equipo que nos ayuda para lograr una mejor atención y que se esfuerza por hacer de la experiencia lo mejor posible. Son Belén, Mayte, Marta y Anaí.

Esperamos verte pronto! Y no dudes en contactarnos para lo que necesites. 

Hebe & Ezequiel

name: Modern house in Le Plateau
summary: Cottage entirely renovated in 2011. Foodies' kitchen, extraordinary light, intimate yard with BBQ and kids' area. Ideal for a family or two couples.
space: Our house is unique on the Plateau. It is an old duplex converted into a two floors family house. There is a beautiful open area on the ground floor with lounge, games room, dining room and kitchen area. The abundance of windows allows light to flood the space throughout the day. There is also a laundry room and a powderoom. The rear of the house overlooks a beautiful private and green courtyard with terrace, BBQ and playground for children. The second floor: three bedrooms and a modern and practical bathroom with heated floor. The master bedroom is widely fenestrated and gives access to a huge private balcony. The second has a single bed,  while the last bedroom has two single beds. In the living room, there is a regular couch and a futon bed for two adults. **NO PARTY GOERS, PLEASE**

neighborhood_overview: Comme le décrit si bien le site de Tourisme Montréal:  "Automobiles importées, vélos usagés, boutiques exclusives, cafés et restaurants : ce quartier populaire devenu yuppie-bohémien est de loin le plus hip à Montréal. Petits théâtres intimes multifonctionnels, friperies et épiceries fines ajoutent au bouillonnement culturel et à l’ambiance bohème qui caractérisent le Plateau, où convergent tous les modes de vie. C’est assurément ici que l’on a la meilleure idée de ce qu’est réellement Montréal. On y trouve une population principalement francophone et totalement éclectique. Artistes, étudiants, jeunes professionnels et nouvelles familles se mêlent aux diverses communautés culturelles, créant une mosaïque humaine extraordinairement vivante et colorée." Voir la carte pour les restaurants, bars et parcs que nous recommandons dans le quartier, à distance de marche.
transit: MÉTRO + MARCHE. La maison est à quelques rues du Métro Mont-Royal. En sortant du métro, il suffit de marcher vers l'Est et de tourner à gauche sur la rue de la Roche pour se rendre au 4675.  DE L'AÉROPORT. Il est possible de prendre une navette publique (autobus no. 747) pour se rendre au Métro Berri-UQUAM qui se trouve à deux stations de la station Mont-Royal. Suivre ensuite les indications ci-dessus.  Autrement, il est possible de louer une voiture à l'aéroport ou de contacter un système de navettes privé. MÉTRO + BUS + MARCHE. Il est également possible de prendre l'autobus no. 97 en face du Métro Mont-Royal direction Est et de descendre coin de la rue de la Roche, puis de marcher vers le Nord. VÉLO. Il est également possible de voyage facilement à vélo dans le quartier, soit à l'aide d'un vélo que nous laissons à votre disposition ou à l'aide des vélos BIXI en libre-service. Il y a plusieurs stations BIXI à proximité de la maison. VOITURE. Il est possible de se stationner sur la rue
access: Cafes and trendy restaurants, grocery stores, beautiful parks, public transit, Mont-Royal, downtown, etc..
