host.host_about: Famille de 5, Caroline, Thierry, Mila 6 ans, Gaël 4 ans et Romain 2 ans, nous sommes tous les 5 de vrais urbains. Notre quartier nous comble par ses cafés, ses restos, ses boutiques, ses parcs, ses pâtisseries, ses piscines, ses musées. Nous avons un chat qui reste ou quitte selon les invités et leur envies, il a adorable, affectueux, vraiment un amour de chat. Nous avons envie de vous recevoir chez nous pour que vous essayez notre petit coin de quartier, jasiez un brin avec nos voisins pendant qu'on se délie les ailes un peu quelque part dans un coin de la planète qui nous change d'air. Chez nous vous aurez de la farine, des oeufs, un pinte de lait, un kit de départ ! bienvenue à Montréal !

reviews.comments:
Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour dans cette agréable maison. Accueillante, confortable, décorée avec goût, propre, elle est idéalement située à proximité des avenues commerçantes Mt royal et Laurier et du parc Lafontaine. Conforme à l annonce cette maison est très bien équipée et parfaitement adaptée pour de jeunes enfants (chaise haute, vélos, poussettes, jouets pour le bain, le jardin, jeux de société, livres etc.). Le jardin est un vrai bonheur. Bref, mes enfants étaient vraiment ravis et nous aussi. 
Caroline et Thierry sont des propriétaires chaleureux, disponibles et prevenants, un gentil présent nous attendait à notre arrivée. Ils ont sincérement contribué à rendre notre séjour très plaisant. Merci encore à cette sympathique famille. Nous venons régulierement à Montréal et nous avons désormais trouvé notre adresse!

This house is amazing!!! It's a beautiful and large space, very clean and organized, exactly as in the photos. The location is right downtown, walking distance to all the restaurants, bakeries, shops and the metro. The backyard patio is ideal for relaxing. 

Caroline and her husband are very welcoming and communicative. They helped us with directions and advice on things to do in the area. Perfect hosts!!!

This was our first experience using airbnb and we were thoroughly satisfied. Caroline welcomed us with an extremely clean house that accurately matched her description on the website. Questions we had prior to arriving were answered quickly by email. She also gave us nice recommendations for restaurants in the area. The Plateau is a wonderful place to stay when in Montreal as you will never go hungry and will always have something fun to do and in walking distance. I would highly recommend staying at their beautifully renovated house and when we return to the area I will be contacting Caroline once again. You also may find a nice surprise in the refrigerator waiting for you. Thank you again for sharing your house with our family.
The Brooks'

This is probably one of the nicest houses you'll stay in. It was spotless, and quite large. The house has everything you could possibly need and is located in a great neighbourhood. I would stay there again in a heartbeat. 
Thank you so much Caroline for the note, muffins & fruit, it was so thoughtful.

Location, location, location.  5+ stars.  If you are traveling with children do not hesitate to book this house.  It is equipped with everything you might need and forgot to pack.  The location is fantastic.  You can walk to cafes and restaurants easily.  There is also a very nice park a short stroll away.  Even though it was very close to all the attractions of Le Plateau the house was very quiet.

The interior of the house is nicely furnished and exceptionally clean.   The bedrooms are set up such that the smaller children's rooms are directly across the hall from the master bedroom.  There is also a screened-in sitting/ play area off of the master that provided some extra space.  The backyard has a perfect little play-set and a romantic lighted table and chairs.  We picked up takeout for lunch and had a nice quiet break in the afternoon before heading out again to explore further.  We were able to secure parking on the street either directly in front of the house or at most a couple of spots away.  

The hosts provided us with some great tips for shopping and dining.  They even secured us a reservation at the fantastic restaurant Le Quartier General around the corner.

This home is a great base for your stay in Montreal.  It really is a perfect spot.

Excellent stay overall. The hosts were very accommodating and communicable. The place just as good or better than the photos, very clean, and comfortable. The location is excellent, close to many restaurants, shops and transit. Highly recommended!
Caroline was an amazing host. She was incredibly responsive and very accommodating. The house is amazing and in a great location for a weekend in Montreal! Couldn't recommend this place more highly.

We loved staying here and I can't recommend this place enough!
Located in the best area of Montreal, this place is absolutely huge and has everything one requires for a comfortable and peaceful stay. It is on a residential street so it is nice and quiet, but very close to lots of great shopping, restaurants, parks and beautiful buildings. Short 5-10 minute walk to the Metro.  Being just two of us, it was way more space than we needed...but no complaints about that! 
It was wonderful to have a place like this to retire to in the evening after long days of walking around the city. Clean and modern, bright and airy, yet very homey. Very comfortable bed in the master suite with lots of natural light all throughout the entire place.  Beautiful modern bathroom with a lovely tub. I wish I had more time so I could have used it, but the shower was fantastic. Also a cute little powder room on the main level was very convenient. The design and aesthetic were consistently beautiful throughout the entire space, which really added to the peaceful serene ambiance. Absolutely beautiful and well equipped kitchen, looking out over a nice outdoor space with yard and deck. 
 Although we did not meet Caroline she was extremely helpful and easy to get in touch with. Checking in and out was incredibly easy, there was lots of information left for us, as well as a bottle of wine, which was immensely appreciated when we arrived.
The only complaint I have is that I was not able to stay there longer, we did not want to leave!  I will definitely keep this place on my list for future trips, it really is the perfect place to stay in Montreal!

La maison était parfaite, telle que décrite! Très propre et accueillante, les propriétaires avaient laissés des petites grignotines faites maison pour nous. 

Pour une famille, cette propriété est idéale - 2 chambres d'enfant décorées de façon très créative. Ma fille de 2 ans était aux anges, il ne manquait pas de jouets! 

Nous avons eu quelques demandes de dernière minute et Caroline et Thierry furent très flexibles. 

L'emplacement est idéal - un havre de paix en plein coeur du Plateau. Tout est accessible à pied. 

Vraiment, une location idéale, merci beaucoup!

Nous avons loué la maison de Caroline et Thierry pour organiser notre photo-shoot.
Nous n'aurions pas pu trouver mieux!
Ils ont été plus que collaboratifs, très ouverts à toutes nos demandes et particulièrement accueillant.

Encore merci à vous 2!
The reservation was canceled 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was an excellent experience - we were delighted with the house, the yard, the location. We found a friendly note to welcome us and a bottle of sparkling wine, too!

The house was just as pictured, very comfortable, plenty of space, and in an excellent neighborhood for restaurants, shopping, and getting to the metro with ease. 

This was our first airbnb experience and we will definitely do this again!

My group of four friends enjoyed our stay at this beautifully designed home.  In the very convenient area of Plateau-Mont Royal, with plenty of shops, restaurants, and the Metro station about 10 min walk away.  The home is spacious and comfortable.  Everything was as presented in the listing and photos; if anything, it was even more impressive in person.  The kitchen, as promised, was a great place to cook in.

Caroline was very accessible and welcoming via email prior to and during the stay, although we did not need to take advantage of her offers to help with reservations or information.  Her kind note and complimentary bottle of rose was most appreciated.

We could not be happier with the hospitality we received.  Such a great experience beginning months before our arrival.  This residence is in one of the best locations in Montreal if you are looking for a true local feel.  Tons of space for a family with very comfortable furnishings, great style, lots of attention to detail.  Close to so many restaurants, shops, and parks.  For a first time visitor to Montreal the advice that Thierry and Caroline provided was invaluable.  Great home base to relax and explore the city.

This was our second stay at Caroline and Thierry's home in Montreal. It was exactly perfect for our family.  The location is very convenient for walking around the neighborhood. There are many cafes and restaurants in close proximity.  The house is well equipped should you choose to eat in.  The back garden is nice spot to relax and enjoy a break from the action. Our children loved having a  "playground" in the backyard.

We loved our Le Plateau house, the perfect size and location for our family of four. Our two kids (ages 8 and 6) loved having the swing set out back, the bunk bed in one room and the trundle bed in the other, plus the toys and books, even in French! We liked having the piano to play on, too!

The kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms, and laundry room are all well equipped (as befitting a European-style kitchen, the coffee maker is a French press), and the giant windows facing out back from upstairs and downstairs are fantastic. We appreciated having the gas grill to use out on the deck and the private back yard (though our kids were likely a bit noisy for the back yards all next to one another!).

The location could not be better! The house is on a quiet residential side street in the hip neighborhood of Le Plateau--it felt like French Brooklyn. It's a very short walk to the Mont-Royal metro stop and on the way home from the metro it's easy to stop at the supermarket en route back to the house to pick up whatever you need for dinner. There are also tons of low-key options when it comes to eating out, especially with kids. There are two Second Cup locations within blocks from the house--like a French Canadian Starbucks and our go-to coffee break spot. Also, there are two playgrounds nearby, and one is next to a public pool.

Having the metro nearby was excellent as nearly everything we did was no more than four or five stops away. We drove up via New York State and we were a little nervous about city street parking, but in the summer at least it was always easy to find parking on days you had to move the car for street cleaning. (It is definitely easier than in New York City!)

We so appreciate being able to use this family house as our home for a week and would come back again!

The serenity of its hidden corners, dark and narro
neighborhood_overview: Our new hotel is located right next to Passatge de les Manufactures, a place packed with history. A passageway recovered to breathe new life into the neighbourhood. A new meeting place in Barcelona. Ciutat Vella is one of the most lively and varied districts in Barcelona. The serenity of its hidden corners, dark and narrow streets, and almost haunted squares breathe life and diversity. In Ciutat Vella you can follow in the footsteps of ancient Romans, pray in Gothic churches reaching for the sky, stroll through the palaces built by the businessmen back from the colonies for their mistresses, follow the trail of the great Modernista architects and enjoy the most contemporary cultural offering in the city in the El Raval neighbourhood.
notes: Tourist tax: €1.21 per adult and night with a maximum of 7 days. Not included and payable upon departure.
transit: The Hotel Yurbban Passage is located 3 minutes walk from Plaza Urquinaona and 10 minutes from Plaza Catalunya.
access: The terrace of Yurbban Passage Hotel is the ideal location for shootings and filmings, a surprise party for your best friend or a laid-back work meeting. All this at the top of the new 'Soho' of Barcelona with one of the best views of the city.
interaction: Our reception is open all the time. There's always someone available in case of emergency. There's always a concierge who can provide recommendations.
house_rules: No smoking allowed. Pets not allowed.

host.host_about:
Bienvenido a Yurbban Passage, soy Marc! Queremos que la experiencia de vivir la ciudad como un auténtico nativo no solamente pase por cuando el viajero se adentre en ella. Apostamos por el talento, los productores y la gastronomía local. Desde el fotomatón y la mesa de shuffleboard hasta el Local Store donde encontrarás piezas únicas elaboradas por productores locales.


Así como una apuesta por la gastronomía de aquí, un típico desayuno catalán o una carta como la de nuestro restaurant D’Aprop elaborada con productos de alta calidad.


Estarás alojado en un hotel que era un antiguo almacén textil, donde se han respetado estructuras como el rosetón de la fachada con las iniciales de Joan Cirici, quien en 1878 creó el pasaje de las Manufactures que atraviesa el hotel.


Welcome to Yurbban Passage, I'm Marc! We want you to experience the city as a true native. We bet on talent, producers and local cuisine. From the photo booth and the shuffleboard table to the Local Store where you will find unique pieces made by local producers.


As well as a commitment to gastronomy, a typical Catalan breakfast or our restaurant D'Aprop.


You will be staying in a hotel that used to be an old textile warehouse, where structures such as the rosette on the facade have been respected with the initials of Joan Cirici, who in 1878 created the passage of Manufactures that runs through the hotel.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Mert’s place for 4 days and we don’t even know where to start to express how great it was. The house is well located in a very lively, well connected and authentic area and that’s already a breath of fresh air compared to the usual touristy places. The apartment is recently renovated and very comfortable, it is a pleasure to cook in the well equipped kitchen and hang out in the living area, and the bed is so huge!
Last but not least, Mert is really really an awesome person. He treated us like family, showing us places around, inviting us to hang out with his friends, and even creating for us a work opportunity. We were looking for a host and we found a friend. He’s so well behaved, interesting, sweet and true, he made our visit unforgettable. There’s definitely no better option in the whole Istanbul!

Mert's House is super! Stylish, Young and in a very beautiful zone, with lor of things to do and see.
Perfect for Young People Who Wanna have Fun.
His place is clean and he is super friendly and kind, he's always there to help. Well done my friend!

I had private room and bathroom .House was super clean and it’s cleaning in a routine. I felt like my real home I stayed fiftheen days.
Mert was super friendly I felt like I know him from a long time ago. He was always helpful honest and respectful. He even introduced me with his kind friends.I can ask everything to Mert easily.
I feeling so lucky to know Mert and If I came to Istanbul again I really want to stay and see the Mert again 
Thank you for everything my friend
Keep in touch!

name: STUDIO AT THE PRICE OF A ROOM
summary: ARTIST STUDIO FOR THE PRICE OF A ROOM.  This is in fact a 55m2 studio that is completely independent from the rest of the Apartment. The studio has its own private entrance and you will have independent access to your own kitchen, bathroom, living room etc... The Studio is only connected to the rest of the apartment by a sealed door, so you won´t even hear any noise. Studio is in Raval , the coolest, most hipster neighbourhood. Filled with bars, nightlife and teeming with people at all times.
space: Apartment is at ground level and can be accessed independently at street level. Apartment is refurbished in Loft Style with some previous elements preserved from when it was an Art Gallery. Because its located in the ground floor, the apartment does not get a lot of direct sunlight.

Perhaps there’s a a difference in American vs Canadian understanding of 1.5 bath! There’s indoor parking FYI for additional cost but it’s worth it especially in winter.  Thanks for being a good host, Amal!

summary: Hammamhane Hotel is located in the heart of Istanbul , Beyoglu district on Çukurcuma Street surrounded by antique shops, art galleries and laid back cafés. Çukurcuma is also known as the Soho of Istanbul. Hammamhane Hotel has been designed to create a sense of comfort and timelesness. We offer studios suites to our guests, each designed uniquely.

neighborhood_overview: Hammamhane, İstanbul’un kalbi Beyoğlu semtinde, antika mağazaları, sanat galerileri ve kafeler ile çevrelenmiş Çukurcuma Caddesi’nde yer almaktadır.  Masumiyet Müzesi ile aynı sokağı paylaşan Hammamhane’den Taksim Meydanı’na 12, Cihangir Meydanı’na 5, İstiklal Caddesi’ne 8, Karaköy ve Tophane tramvay durağına ise 10 dakikada yürüyerek ulaşılabilir. Geçmişi günümüzle buluşturan mimarisiyle kapılarını açan tesisimiz her biri farklı tasarlanmış stüdyo odaları ve teras süitleri ile konuklarına hizmet vermektedir. Asansör mevcuttur. Stüdyo odaların ve süitlerin her biri sigara içilmeyen odalardır. Sigara içen konuklar için giriş katındaki teras ortak alan olarak tahsis edilmiştir. Şahsi balkonu veya terası bulunan odalarda bu kısımlarda sigara içilebilir.  Kahvaltı servisi her sabah değişen zengin menüsüyle konuklara sunulmaktadır. Çocuk ve bebekleriyle seyahat eden konuklar için ekstra bebek ve çocuk yatağı ve mama sandalyesi sağlanmaktadır. Arabasıyla seyahat eden konuklar için ücretli ot
notes: Tarihi Cukurcuma Hamamından yararlanmak isteyen konuklarımıza % 10 indirim sunulmaktadır.
transit: TAKSIM METRO ISTASYONU 15 DAKIKA  TOPHANE TRAM ISTASYONU 10 DAKIKA
access: Hammamhane is witihin walking distance to the art galleries, design stores, antique shops, chic restaurants and cafés. A variety of restaurants ranging from fast food to local and international dining are within walking distance. Daily breakfast is served in traditional style. Based on Orhan Pamuk's famous novel, the Museum of Innocence is 160 metres from the property and the iconic Galata Tower is 1.2 km away. Tophane is a 10-minute walk, and Cihangir which houses many cafés and restaurants is 5 minutes walk. Taksim Square is a 10-minute walk away and Ataturk Airport is within 20 km.
interaction: We will host our guests during your day and night time  whatever guests might need ..

space: 酒店处于九龙尖沙咀的中心地带,位于九龙繁忙闹市的弥敦道,尽享交通枢纽的便利优势｡邻近尖沙咀地铁站,面对清真寺,九龙公园,步行名店购物街,广东道海港城,只需数分钟｡国际名牌手袋LV,GUCCI,Burberry等等近在咫尺,让宾客感受香港的繁华气息

PS:房間內沒有炊具配備,不支持房內烹飪.毛巾.浴巾.枕頭和被子的數量根據房型配備,如需增加數量需要額外加收費用.床單.被單.枕套為一客一換,如需每天更換需要額外加收費用. 【免費寄存行李服務】入住時間為下午2點,退房時間為次日中午12點(我們需要在您退房之後做保潔,將房間整潔的準備給下一位要入住的客人),入住當天提前到達或退房後我們均可提供免費寄存行李服務,退房後行李寄存時限為退房當天的下午18:00之前. 【关于出行】下訂單預訂經過我們確認訂單,付款之後我們都會統一將如何來到我家的具體路線及我们的详细地址.联系电话发送到您的郵箱.入住的當天您直接到达出示身份證件報名字,交納200元港幣的入住押金即可辦理登記入住,退房返还. 我們有專人每天負責接待每位客人的入住和退房的辦理手續.還有負責房間清潔的專人每天打掃房間衛生,確保客人每天都保持潔淨舒適的住宿環境. 尖沙咀是位于九龙半岛南端,面临维多利亚港,与香港岛的中环隔海相望｡这里有香港必去景点星光大道､维港,是大型商场林立的购物天堂,也是科学馆､艺术馆齐聚的文化中心,在这里可以度过充实的一天｡ 主要
neighborhood_overview: 尖沙咀是位于九龙半岛南端,面临维多利亚港,与香港岛的中环隔海相望｡这里有香港必去景点星光大道､维港,是大型商场林立的购物天堂,也是科学馆､艺术馆齐聚的文化中心,在这里可以度过充实的一天｡ 主要景点 尖沙咀有着很多著名景点,星光大道,维多利亚港,《重庆森林》取景地重庆大厦,天星小轮和九龙公园, 购物天堂 尖沙咀是九龙最著名的高档商业区,拥有dfs全球免税店､海港城､sogo等大型购物商场,也有lv､prada 文化中心 这里还有香港历史博物馆､香港科学馆､香港太空馆及香港文化中心等文化场所,设施先进,寓教于乐,是亲子游的好选择｡  特别提示  1.逛尖沙咀建议选择平底舒适的鞋子,避免高跟鞋｡  2. 商铺上午通常开门较晚,可避免一大早前往购物｡  3. 特色街上人很多,逛街时候还需注意安全｡
notes: 入住時間為下午2點,退房時間為次日中午12點(我們需要在您退房之後做保潔,將房間整潔的準備給下一位要入住的客人), 入住當天提前到達或退房後我們均可提供免費寄存行李服務,退房後行 李寄存時限為退房當天的下午18:00之前.如果您寄存行李需要寄存超過退房當天18:00過後,需要額外加收費｡ 下訂單預訂經過我們確認訂單,付款之後我們都會統壹將如何來到我家的具體路線發送到您的郵箱或留言Airbnb. 到店當天直接到店出示身份證件報名字,交納200元(港幣)的入住押金即可辦理 登記入住. 在預訂之前請註意:我們的房間一旦確認訂單,即不接受變更改期.只能根據退訂政策執行退訂.  ★我們的房間照片全部為實地拍照,但是盡管這樣,房間照片只作參考.
transit: 港铁直达尖沙咀地铁站,任何一个出口出来即是尖沙咀闹市,也可以从香港国际长搭乘A21巴士直达尖沙咀,费用在33港币/人;从深圳或广州坐中港通跨境巴士入境香港,都能在尖沙咀下车

name: Rhodes Meriton Apartment
summary: The is a Meriton apartment which is located close to public transportation (about 7 mints walk to Rhodes train station and the bus station is outside the building. This apartment is near shopping center (cinema, supermarket, foodcourt, etc, ).
space: The room is the double room (entire new furniture) and you will have your own bathroom. Also,  the free gym and swimming pool is available.
description: The is a Meriton apartment which is located close to public transportation (about 7 mints walk to Rhodes train station and the bus station is outside the building. This apartment is near shopping center (cinema, supermarket, foodcourt, etc, ). The room is the double room (entire new furniture) and you will have your own bathroom. Also,  the free gym and swimming pool is available. You can use the kitchen, living room and the balcony before 12:00am. Chinese and English speacking This apartment is located close to train station and shopping center. Some eating places just downstaris.
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located close to train station and shopping center. Some eating places just downstaris.
access: You can use the kitchen, living room and the balcony before 12:00am.
interaction: Chinese and English speacking
house_rules: - 1.	Clean kitchen after cooking, No dishes should be left in water tank for long time. - Keep reasonable volume in home, no loud talking, especially at night. - Unrecoverable damage to furniture/property need be compensated.

reviews.comments: 交通便捷,靠近地跌和公交车站,很方便去市中心和DFO,附近有超市和购物中心, 房间很整洁,布置的很温馨,房主很nice,性价比很高,是一次极好的入住体验
close to public transport, very nice hostess and nice room.
Great!
沟通很及时,地点也很方便,强烈推荐

name: RARE: Large Room + Big Townhouse = Better Stay
summary: You get a large, clean and comfortable room, in a big townhouse on a quiet street with. Plenty of nearby dining, drinking and grocery options. Short walk to hubs: 4 min to Subway platform (L Train), 7 min to McCarren Park, and 12 min to the heart of Williamsburg - Bedford Ave. The space is rarely available, as it's usually used as a permanent bedroom.
space: The bedroom is roomy, clean and has a comfortable bed. I'm still working on sprucing up the room and providing better services for my guests, so I endeavor to be as hospitable as possible and am grateful for any feedback. I've recently painted, added a new bed, along with a lounge chair and a TV with YouTube and Netflix access.  Guests have access to their own private bedroom, and a shared bathroom and washer/dryer with me and two/three male residents.  My aim is to make it private, clean and comfortable. It's also as quiet as you will probably find a New York townhouse. The room is off the already quiet street. You can also sometimes hear footsteps from the upstairs bedroom in the mornings, or a little noise from the other rooms.

Short walk to hubs: 4 min to Subway platform (L Train), 7 min to McCarren Park, and 12 min to the heart of Williamsburg - Bedford Ave. The space is rarely available, as it's usually used as a permanent bedroom. It's also as quiet as you will probably find a New York townhouse. The room is off the already quiet street. You can also sometimes hea
neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg is a sought-after neighborhood to stay in, particularly for outgoing adults and European guests.
transit: Short walk to transportation hubs: 4 min to Subway platform (L Train), 7 min to McCarren Park, and 12 min to the heart of Williamsburg - Bedford Ave. There is a Citibike station only a block away.
access: Guests have access to their own private bedroom, and a shared bathroom, kitchen, living room and washer/dryer with me and two male housemates. The living/kitchen area is on a separate floor and there is a large outdoor area out the back.
interaction: Someone from our house is usually present during the guest's stay (we work a variety of hours) and we make ourselves available to greet, chat, give advice as needed. I love meeting new people, but I'll also respect your privacy. From experience there is usually limited integration with short time guests and plenty of interaction with long term guests.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Aussie guy that loves NYC and now calls it home. I'm well travelled, but am always planning my next trip - middle east to central Asia will be my next big trip. 
I'm also a sports fan, and love keeping fit and active. 
While travel and sports are a great way to meet interesting people, I'm finding Airbnb is also a fab way to meet and give back to fellow travelers.

reviews.comments: Jon is great! Very friendly and in a nice neighborhood. Clean, large bedroom. Everything was perfect!

Jon was a great host! He was easy to communicate with and was very committed to making sure that I had enjoyable stay. The room was large, his location was close to the subway and quick trip into Manhattan.  He was devoted to improving the room for future guests. I do look forward to staying with Jon again whenever possible. Thanks Jon!

I needed a room on short notice, but Jon was able to immediately accommodate me for the time that I was in Brooklyn. From our first interaction to our last, Jon seemed like a very cool and amicable guy and one of the best hosts I've encountered through Airbnb. The Williamsburg location is the best in the city if you want to experience Brooklyn and Manhattan. The L train which connects to Manhattan is a block away. The room itself had an AC which was a delight. The bed was comfy, the internet was fast, and everything else about the rather large room was great. I'd come back in a second!

Jon was fantastic! From the minute I arrived, he was extremely attentive to my needs. He really made sure I was comfortable and was an all around gregarious and kind person.

The room was clean, spacious and close to so many great bars and restaurants. This was a good thing because it was easy come back to rest after being out in the heat. I would highly recommend staying here. Great bang your buck.

Jon and his brother Adam were very friendly and accommodating. Even though my flight was delayed and I was basically without communication, they made sure I got in safely. They were always very eager to help. 

The apartment is located in Williamsburg, off the L train, which is very well connected to Manhattan and also a great spot for nightlife. The room is very ample so it was ideal for sharing with my friend. Very comfortable bed, which was very good news for me and my friend who suffer from back problems. It also has A/C, which of course, we didn't need at all during the winter, but if you plan to visit NYC during the --(very) hot summer days, you should really consider this, since it's very rare to find in New York.

The room is exactly as described. It is clean, comfortable, cozy and huge for NYC standards. The bed is super comfortable and the best part of the room. The apartment is well located in Williamsburg, so the metro stop is close and it is easy to arrive to Manhattan. Additionally Jon, the host, is awesome and very careful in trying to make their guests feel comfortable and enjoy their stay. Also, he is very willing to help or advise in anything needed. I believe is the best option for a NYC experience in overall; the price, the place and the host which is very rare or difficult to find especially in the city. I highly recommend to stay here and for sure  I  will do it again.

Everything about my stay was excellent - location, the room, Jon himself. I arrived late at night while Jon was at work, but he sent me very clear and detailed instructions on how to enter the apartment and my room. The room itself was clean, large and well-furbished, and the apartment is in a great location. 

I only met Jon briefly, but he was very friendly, as were his roommates. He was very accommodating in letting me keep my luggage at the apartment after check out before my flight later in the day, and was always contactable via text or email.

Would love to stay again!

Jon made time to meet me at his workplace to supply the keys and introduced me to his (Hidden by Airbnb) , who were all very welcoming. Jon is a great host! - Welcoming, sociable plus it's a fantastic location with plenty of bars/restaurants nearby. It only took me 20 minutes to get into Central Manhatten for work.

I'd say that the listing is pretty spot on to what you get and would definitely recommend.
Great spot to stay at, Jon was very Courteous. The room is big but warm during a NYC winter.. Perfect place to stay if you want to explore the city,   Will definitely be going back

My 3 nights experience at Jon's place was absolutely comfortable and relaxing. He's done all the things I needed without me asking him. Such a huge room with decent real bed and warm decoration. Obviously it's surrounded by great neighborhood. Plus, it's never stressful to commute anywhere as it's less than 5 min walk away from L train which takes you to Manhattan so easily. I very much enjoyed to take a walk in Williamsburg. I love Brooklyn and it was my first time to visit during winter. I'm such a summer person so I'm glad I still fall in love with BK! Thank you so much, Jon :)
Jon is a really good ans welcoming host. He provided me everything i need and made my stay really enjoyable! Room is realy spacious and location is great! Totally recomend!

We really enjoyed our stay in NYC at Jon's apartment. The room is very comfortable and large, and the apartment is in a handy part of Brooklyn - close to the metro (L train), shops, and close to cool areas like Bedford Avenue. 

Jon was helpful with directions and easy to get in contact with. Super flexible with our enquiries and requests (he even let us leave a piece of luggage with him as we travelled elsewhere for a few days, despite us not starting our stay at the apartment until we returned). 

Definitely would love to go back!

I didn't have a chance to meet Jon, but this was a very comfortable room in a great part of Williamsburg, with the subway just a few blocks away, and is around the corner from some wonderful restaurants and shops. The bed was very comfortable, and Jon's housemates were very friendly and accommodating. Also, they have a washer/dryer, which was incredibly convenient! Jon was also very responsive, and was very easy to work with when I asked if I could stay an extra day, which was very appreciated. Would absolutely recommend!

Jon's apartment is in a convenient and quiet Williamsburg location. Super easy access to Manhattan (if the L is running... there's been construction lately). The bedroom itself is clean and comfortable with a good deal of light. Jon was super responsive and easy to reach. 
Guests should note that the room does not come with a living room or any access to a kitchen. If you just need a bedroom and shared bathroom in Williamsburg, this is a great spot at a fair price.
Great place to stay in Brooklyn. Jon was away but he managed everything well. Location is good if L line is working. Neighborhood is good and perfect for a weekend stay for couples.

I have truly enjoyed my stay in Jon's room. The room is cozy, large with a very comfortable bed. So, I would say that in my experience the room perfectly match the description. Moreover, Jon has provided me with everything I needed and he was always very helpful (he promptly replied to all my message). The borough...well it's Williamsburg, so no much to add. In short, a fantastic experience which I truly recommend.

It was a busy weekend and we didn't spend much time in the room except to sleep.  The accommodations were clean and comfortable, the people friendly and the location in Williamsburg was very convenient.  I would definitely recommend it to other travelers!

Jon's room was the perfect pick! It looks exactly like on the pictures and the location was also very convenient, the L & G train were just around the corner. Even though I did not meet Jon in person, he was super friendly and provided all information around the house beforehand. The house was a bit clairaudient, but that was no a big problem. Biggest plus was the bed - very comfy. If you search for a nice place to stay in Williamsburg I can absolutley recommend Jon's!

I truly enjoyed staying at Jon's room. The room was exactly as described - very spacious with a comfortable bed. Jon is a very friendly host and made time to welcome me and explained everything I needed to know. He was very responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) when I had questions later as well. He also kindly shared with me a taxi contact to arrange a ride to the airport, which was a lot cheaper than Uber :) The neighborhood is very convenient in terms of public transportation and getting necessary stuff like water. Williamsburg is a pretty neighborhood and I enjoyed just walking around and checking out random shops (that are all hipster and cool!).

We had a great time at Jon's place! The room we stayed in was really nice: big bed, lots of space, desk with a chair, and lots of storage room. We also slept very well - it is very quiet at night.
Jon was there to greet us upon arrival and made us feel at home immediately. He even went to Harlem together with my boyfriend to play some basketball! :-)
About Williamsburg... it is truly Awesome. You will feel relaxed and safe when you stay there.You have so many cool place to go out for dinner, have brunch (a must-do!!), go for drinks, or just stroll around and discover cool shops and coffee bars. Jon also gave some good recommendations, thanks for that. 
All in all, we recommend Jon's place for sure! Don't hesitate, just stay there, you won't regret it!!
 
With the subway you are in Manhattan in ten minutes.

Jon's place was centrally located and within a couple blocks of L metro. The room was clean and Jon was great at touching base with us to make sure that we arrived without problem. The bed was super comfortable and we had everything we needed. The only thing is that the bathroom ran out of toilet paper at one point, but other than that everything was great!

Great room, great neighborhood and great host !
We had everything we needed and Jon is very helpful and welcoming. We recommend this room for a stay in NYC.
Perfect room! Large and airy and AC was wonderful. Jon was very accommodating and always easy to get ahold of. Great location, steps away from L train. Would definitely recommend.

Jon is fantastic and went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and welcome.  He's a really wonderful person.  The room is very nice, clean, big, and comfortable.  It is also quiet so perfect for a good night's sleep!  The location is close to the L train making it easy to get everywhere in the city.  Love the neighborhood- lots of cute restaurants and fun things to do. Highly recommend Jon's spot!

Excellente expérience! Accueil chaleureux de Edwin, Adam et John. Ils m'ont partagé de nombreuses excellentes adresses de Brooklyn, Manhattan, et alentours. Mais ils m'ont également convié à différentes sorties toutes plus amusantes les unes que les autres. Cerise sur le gâteau, le logement est impeccable et rien n'y manque! Définitivement un plaisir d'y avoir résidé

I stayed at John's house for 8 nights. The house is very comfortable and really well located. I met John and his room mates and they all made me feel at ease from the moment I met them. Highly recommended! I would definitely go back!! Thanks John.

This was a really great place to stay. The room is huge with lots of storage space, work space, a very comfortable bed and everything I needed (hair dryer etc all provided) and the location is excellent – seconds from the L into town and very close to Williamsburg's bars & restaurants, but just enough away that it feels like a peaceful escape. Jon was a wonderful host - super attentive and really proactive at checking in and making sure I had everything I needed. Thanks!

Great place to stay! More space than a hotel room and a very comfortable bed. Location is superb, close to public transportation and lots of coffee places, restaurants and bars. Jon did a great job to make sure I could find the place. Check-in and check-out were easy and Jon was easy to get in touch with whenever necessary. Fantastic host!

Jon is SO nice and I appreciated his prompt replies and willingness to help. The apartment is fine--- comfy bed and quiet room. The shower was a little quirky. Overall a fine place to crash for a night.

If you're looking to stay in Williamsburg (coolest neighborhood in Brooklyn) - Jon's place is perfect for that. The location is amazing and super close to the train stations as well. Also, the room is huge and has everything you need. 5/5

I had a great experience while staying with Jon and his roommates. Everything from the communication to directions and amenities provided (towels, shampoo, etc.) were great. The room itself is big and bright and the neighborhood is beautiful and safe. His guidebook had good local food recommendations too. For the most part they let me be on my own and didn't bother me. I would stay again.
Place was a perfect location. Everything was accurate regarding the space. Would have liked to have had a beer with Jon but had a short stay and busy schedule. Will stay again for sure!
Jon is an excellent airbnb member!  I would definitely stay at his place in Williamsburg again!
Jon was a great host and very helpful . Thanks a lot !

We stayed 3 nights at Jons place. Jon was very friendly and welcoming. As were his room mates. When we had questions, he answered them directly. Communication was perfect. The room was big and looked like the pictures online. Perfect for 2 persons.  We didn't have problems sharing the bathroom, but is a bit small if you want to get ready at the same time. It's a quiet and safe area and you're in walking distance from the cool Williamsburg area. It's also easy to get to Manhattan with the L-train. We would recommand a stay at jons place!
Exactly what you see in the add. A bed, bathroom and laundry right by the entrance. Easy to get keys and everything you need to know in a (Hidden by Airbnb) doc. Quiet, great location, friendly host.
Everything was great. Jon is super organized and detailed. Roommates were all friendly. Subway is close, with a great bagel place by the entrance/exit. I would totally come back again.

Jon was a fantastic host. This was my first Airbnb experience and he has set a high standard. He would definitely make me use the site again as my first option for accommodation. He was personable and considerate. Also got me out of a pickle when I locked the key in the house. Genuinely a perfect host.

Jon was a fantastic host. He was quick to respond to my last minute request to book and proved to be super responsive throughout the entire experience. He was very thorough in the details he offered about the house and neighborhood. The location is perfectly situated in the heart of Williamsburg with much to do in the surrounding blocks. His apt is a mere 3 minute walk to the L train which was a definite plus. The room was spacious and light-filled and stocked with amenities you'd find at a boutique hotel (Malin + Goetz body wash?!). Wi-fi was fast and he offered the password without prompt on several instances. What really set Jon apart from past experiences, however was his natural ability and eagerness to host that was not overbearing in the least. What's more is that his roommate Edwin, who did not have to bother with me, was just as gracious and hospitable as Jon was. In fact, it was my experience at Jon's that prompted me to move to Brooklyn that same week! Stay here. You won't regret it.

The room is fantastic. It has everything you could ask for as well as being conveniently located near the metro station. Jon provided lots of thoughtful little things (e.g. a universal charger, shampoo, metro card) which just added something to the whole experience. I didn't meet Jon but his communication was clear and everything ran smoothly and his housemates were very friendly and easygoing. I couldn't recommend the place highly enough!

Nice stay at Jon's place. Room is as described. It a large, tidy space. The bed is super comfortable and Jon is a thoughtful host. We didn't manage to meet but he's excellent to communicate with. The place is in a good location, super close to the L & G trains.

Great room, super comfy bed and good location just a short stroll from main Williamsburg. Tube just around the corner so perfect if you are flying into either JFK or Newark. Didn't meet John but communication was quick and easy and he helped me out with lots of questions I had. Would def recommend.
Jon's place was great and all the info he left in the apartment was really helpful. The description is accurate and everything went smoothly.

I had a great stay at Jon's apartment. Jon gave me detailed explanations on how to get set up in the room and nearby grocery stores/food. The room is spacious, comfortable, and just as described. The location is perfect in East Williamsburg - a 2 minute walk from the train. Jon was very easy to reach and happy to accommodate my check-in and check-out at off hours. I would enjoy staying here again - very recommended!
Jon was very accommodating and the entire stay was easy. He had great tips for the neighborhood and was easily reachable via SMS. I'll stay there again when I'm back in NY.
Jon's place was cool. Located in a nice area and easy to get in and out of the city. He was always response and helpful whenever I needed anything. I'd stay again.
Everything was nice. Big room, close to subway line L. Nice roommates.
Jon was an excellent host. Very attentive. Location was really great, close to L train and everything.

Never met Jon, but he was very welcoming and helpful via e-mail. Location was great. Check-in was easy. Room absolutely met my expectations.
Bonus points for Pavement poster in the bathroom.

Staying at Jon's place was simply great. Nice and clean house, amazing neighborhood, friendly people, convenient for transportation to downtown Manhattan. Williamsburg is awesome to hangout at night but also very pleasant to live in. I would recommend Jon's place to anyone interested to experience Williamsburg.
Place was great, massive room and awesome location in Brooklyn. Definitely will come back here when I'm back in NYC!

Everything was great; the room was very large (for New York) and clean. I appreciated the friendliness of the roommate staying in the other room on the same floor. Location was great (i.e., plenty of nearby coffeeshops and food) and very close to the Lorimer L train stop. I'd highly recommend this place if you're looking for a quiet and convenient place to stay, with easy access to Manhattan. Communication with Jon regarding check-in was smooth. Jon also provided information about transportation, and any other miscellaneous information about the AirBnB far in advance, making the stay a seamless one. 

Thanks to Jon for an excellent AirBnB experience!
Jon was super communicative and attentive. Great room right on the subway. Very easy experience.

This was a great Brooklyn/Williamsburg location.  I was visiting my kids.  We did go into Manhattan to see a show, but that was not the focuses of my visit.  It is easy to get there on the subway.  Lots of great restaurants and local bars. Perfect if you are looking for a place to drop your bags and visit others.
Jon is a very great host. Everything was perfect.

Jon's apartment was perfect for me!
- The check-in couldn't be better. He sent me all instructions and everything was precise. 
- The room is only 8 steps to the front door that suits well for whom is travelling with big bags. It's very cozy, bright, quiet, wide and clean.
- The very short walk  to the metro Line L (200m) and G (500m) is perfect!!! 
Thank you, I will be back gladly again.

This was the best Airbnb experience I've ever had. Great roommates, great location. Great restaurants and bars all within walking distance. Roommates are very cool. Made a trip to New York one of the better trips I've taken in a while. Awesome.

Jon and his roommates made my stay an absolutely brilliant and fantastic experience. The room is big and even nicer in real, the bed very comfortable. Jon has been very responsive and helpful. This was a true 5 Star experience. Excellent!

I usually don't like to AirBnB but I decided I had to do a month long job in NY and figured this would be the best financial option... WOW! I cannot begin to describe how lucky I feel. Jon and his 2 roommates(one includes his brother) were the kindest and most respectable men I have met. They were incredibly welcoming and instantly treated me as one of their close friends. Inviting me in their inner circle and inviting me to come see the city with them. 

I think its important to note: THIS IS THE LARGEST SPACE IN NY OR BROOKLYN I HAVE EVER SEEN. The room is huge. There is TONS OF SPACE for living and kitchen cooking. And most of all.... THERE IS A GIANT BACKYARD TO GRILL.

THE LOCATION: its perfectly nuzzled up near the L train which is a 12min ride into the heart of the city of Manhattan. I don't know how anyone can pass this up. The price, community, and location is almost too good to be true.

Plus if you stay there.... ask to try the famous Montoya hot sauce. Game-Changer.

I’m lucky enough to be able to stay in jon’s place at nyc super-peak season (new years).

The place itself is really nice. It is strategically located a block away from the L train that will bring you to manhattan in about 10minutes. Maybe williamsburg is already famous as the ‘cool’ area, but the neighborhood itself is really cool, so many local pubs and restaurants a stone’s throw away from jon’s place (i personally liked the brooklyn star). The room is spacious, clean and located in the 1st floor. (My last stay in NY is in a 5th floor apartment with no lift, so jon’s place being in the ground floor is a godsend)

Even when i didn’t have the chance to meet jon personally, he kept in touch via text and very helpful (so does his roomates)

All in all, the place and the host are great, super recommended.

Jon fue muy cordial y simpático, las instrucciones para mi llegada fueron perfectas.
Primero destacar la ubicación, a menos de 3 cuadras del metro más cercano, además en un barrio tranquilo.
El departamento compartido de Jon estaba muy bien, limpio y ordenado. A pesar de no ver mucho a la gente ya que anduve todo el día recorriendo la ciudad, siempre hubo tranquilidad en el lugar y ningún problema para dormir o usar los espacios comunes.
Recomiendo totalmente a Jon y su departamento, fue mucho mejor de lo que esperaba!
Great Airbnb, everything was easy and the guys were very accommodating and helpful. Thanks!

For sure it was my best experience with Airbnb.  The apartment is greate. The neighborhood is very nice. The train is very close. Jon, Adam and Edwin are very hospitable and best mates.

Super indico o apartamento do Jon. Foi sem dúvida milha melhor experiência com Airbnb. Podem ir de olho fechado...

You are so lucky to have found this room :)
Amazing location, very close to he L and G lines, good restaurants and facilities. Very comfortable house and bedroom - with the best hosts! 
The place is great and the guys made me feel at home during my stay. The bed is very good and the bedroom has great natural light. Jon is an amazing host. Loved being there! 
Look no further (;
Jon’s place was great. The room was lovely with a super comfortable bed. Really close to the subway too! Would definitely stay again.

One of the best Airbnb experiences that I had. The room is spacious. The bed is super comfy and it’s a nice house. Location is perfect just a short walk to a subway and the neighborhood itself is awesome. Jon and his roommates are super cool. I had a chance to hang out with them quite a bit watching tv and just taking. Would recommend to anyone who wants a good place to stay in Brooklyn.

Absolutely great stay with Jon, house is very cosy and the lads are awesome and helpful company, I had a great stay here. Also excellent service to Manhattan with the L and Williamsburg right within walking distance. Recommend!
Staying at Jon’s place was great! Communication was very clear and Jon and his friends were very helpful during my stay. I will be happy to stay again at his place.
Excellent place, truly a jewel in Brooklyn. Lots of restaurants and shops at walking distance, as well as subway stations. Jon and the guys were amazing hosts.

Big room with all and more commodities, perfect location, cool guys ... if you are searching for a great spot, this one is the best I have tried in NYC ! 
Thanks

name: Lovely apartment in Taksim(Beyoglu) Central
summary: Very close to all the local place in Beyoğlu/Cihangir. İn a beautiful, sunny, alley with a view of istanbul's historic area
space: Beyoğlu is central of İstanbul. All local nightclubs, exhibitions and museums, restaurants and historic sites are very close to this neighborhood. A neighborhood that is close to all means of transport and has a lot of young population.
description: Very close to all the local place in Beyoğlu/Cihangir. İn a beautiful, sunny, alley with a view of istanbul's historic area Beyoğlu is central of İstanbul. All local nightclubs, exhibitions and museums, restaurants and historic sites are very close to this neighborhood. A neighborhood that is close to all means of transport and has a lot of young population. You can ask me to suggestion about İstanbul’s local life, events, restourants and everything that what you need. Central building at the heart of city in a historical neighbourhood.  You can reach to most popular pedestrian street (Istiklal Street) in few minutes on foot. Very close to train and bus stations.
neighborhood_overview: Central building at the heart of city in a historical neighbourhood.  You can reach to most popular pedestrian street (Istiklal Street) in few minutes on foot.
transit: Very close to train and bus stations.
interaction: You can ask me to suggestion about İstanbul’s local life, events, restourants and everything that what you need.
house_rules: it is not appropriate to walk around the house with shoes.

reviews.comments: Busra was a very lovely and helpful host. She gave us a lot of great places to visit and was always quick to respond to our messages. The apartment was really cool, clean and cosy for 2 people however the bed was quite small for 2 people - but Busra kindly let us have her bed without any issues and paid for us to get a Turkish sim for wifi as it was not working. She resolved any issues we had and we really enjoyed our stay. Location was very convenient too. Thanks again:)
Amazing person and place !

Questo appartamento è incantevole, semplice ma non banale, curato e pulito. La posizione è perfetta e molto tranquilla. È davvero il luogo migliore per viversi Istanbul nel modo più autentico. Büsra inoltre è una persona bellissima, molto disponibile e sempre a disposizione... di sicuro è qualcuno che sa avvalorare ulteriormente una visita nella sua città :) Consigliatissimo!
Perfect location in Istanbul

Очень стильная квартира в аутентичном районе Стамбула. Удобное расположение: в 5-7 минутах от главной улицы. Гостеприимная и отзывчивая хозяйка, милый кот, который по утрам просыпался вместе с нами. 
 Из минусов хотелось бы отметить слабую связь wi-fi и не очень удобный душ. А также неточное описание квартиры, там указано, что квартира сдаётся целиком, а в реальности оказалось, что нет. 
В целом, мы очень довольны отдыхом, несмотря на некоторые недочеты, которые легко можно исправить.

name: Comfortable Flat with Facilities in Sisli
summary: Hi, I live in Şişli, Istanbul, Turkey with my flatmate. I am a Corporate Sales Manager in a multinational company and my flatmate works in a bank. Our house is surrounded with local shops and a friendly neighborhood. Our place is close to city center. It takes about 10 minutes by taxi and 30 minutes by walk to go to Taksim square; also close to malls (Cevahir mall and Trump towers by walk and the many other mall by bus or metro).
space: We have 3 bedrooms, 1 living room, 1 bathroom and 1 kitchen. We share kitchen, bathroom and the living room which includes wifi, TV, music system and laundry facility. 1 of our bedrooms is for our guests. Our living room is smoker free zone. We don't have a lift but our apartment is on the first floor. We like travelling, resting at home, going to gym, meeting with friends and watching TV.

We gladly will entertain guests who are friendly and polite. Please don't hesitate to contact for any further questions.

name: MECİDİYEKÖY(Şişli) close to Taksim/Beşiktaş
house_rules: Enterance latest 02.00 am

name: Stunning, spacious cat lover's paradise
summary: Beautiful, recently renovated open concept condo. The space exudes a sophisticated, yet homey feel with it's dark hardwood floors, exposed brick walls and cozy furniture.
space: The entrance, reading nook, living room and office form big open space full of natural light. Musicians will be delighted to pick some sheet music from the office bookcase and tickle the ivories in the living room.  The office area can be completely closed off from the living space using the double french doors when separate spaces are needed. Book lovers of all ages will enjoy curling up in the papasan chair in the afternoon sunlight with some English- or French-language literature from the bookcase. Minerva, the grey calico, is playful and friendly. Guests can simply enjoy her company, everything else is taken care of. She enjoys sitting on my lap of curling up next to me in bed, but I don't know if she'll be that outgoing with guests! This is a bit of a test, hence the low price for this jem of a place. The sunrise lamp on the bedstand is the perfect way to wake up and, with the kitchen just off the bedroom, a morning coffee is never far away.
description: Beautiful, recently renovated open concept condo. The space exudes a sophisticated, yet homey feel with it's dark hardwood floors, exposed brick walls and cozy furniture. The entrance, reading nook, living room and office form big open space full of natural light. Musicians will be delighted to pick some sheet music from the office bookcase and tickle the ivories in the living room. She enjoys sitting on my lap of curling up next to me in bed, but I don't know if she'll be that outgoing with guests! This is a bit of a test, hence the low price for this jem of a place. The sunrise
neighborhood_overview: De Bordeaux is a very quiet street with little traffic, and free parking is usually quite easy to find. It is a residential neighborhood, with many young families and cute alleys  full of lurking cats. There is a very well stocked dépanneur (corner store) very close by (1 minute) where basic groceries, a few gourmet products, some vegan milks and a great selection of microbrewed beers are available. It is right next to a cute bakery. There is a pharmacy nearby, and some grocery stores 5 or 10 minutes away by foot. Montreal's iconic Plateau is just on the other side of the train tracks (don't worry—we can't hear the trains from the apartment). Along the track runs a great cycle path that is safe from traffic and wide enough to accommodate walkers, runners and bikers. It runs all the way to the metro station (Rosemont), about ten minutes by bixi or twenty by foot.
access: Guests can access all spaces in the apartment, including laundry room. I just ask that they leave the cupboard under the stairs (left upon entering) undisturbed, as I am currently harbouring an underaged wizard in it.
interaction: I'll be available by phone or text between 8 am and 12 pm. I'll be going out of town for this stay so unfortunately will be unavailable for socialising.
house_rules: Please clean what you use in the kitchen/Prière de laver la vaisselle si vous cuisinez If you let Minerva out, please make sure she comes back in before leaving the apartment/Si vous laissez Minerva sortir, veuillez vous assurer qu'elle soit rentrée avant que vous ne quittiez d'appartement. You may play the piano respectfully and for a reasonable amount of time between 11 am and 8 pm. Please be mindful that the neighbours can hear you — no banging on the keys, drilling scales for hours, or twelve tone rows/Vous pouvez jouer du piano de manière respectueuse et pour une durée raisonnable entre 11h et 20h. Oui, les voisins vous entendent! Prenez ceci en considération : ne piochez pas sur les touches, ne répétez pas vos gammes pendant des heures et pas de musique dodécaphonique ;)

host.host_about:
I'm a self-employed musician. I love reading, eating, connecting with people. I laugh really loudly.

Music is my passion and life's work.  I love books, fiction and non-fiction... They are how I travel when I don't have the budget for a plane ticket. I love to eat: tasting new food, learning to cook a delicious dish, and sharing it. My idea of a perfect evening includes a few wonderful people, some good food, some wine or a couple of beers and lively conversation.

Je suis parfaitement bilingue français/anglais y hablo espanol bastante bien.

reviews.comments: Très beau logement, bien situé. Amelie est toujours facile à contacter et attentionnée.
Amazing spot!

name: Charming 2 Bedroom by Prospect Park
summary: 2 bedroom apartment with huge backyard 10 houses away from the park. Minutes away from restaurants, shops, ice cream! and the F/G train (8 stops from Manhattan).  Perfect for families, couples, and joy-seeking humans of all kinds.
space: A recently renovated pre-war building. Tile kitchen and bathroom. Hardwood floors. A large, comfy master bedroom with smaller kid's bedroom that has two beds. There are toys and a bassinet for infants (can be removed otherwise). The backyard is huge and perfect for relaxing, playing, bbqing or flower-gazing.
description: 2 bedroom apartment with huge backyard 10 houses away from the park. Minutes away from restaurants, shops, ice cream! and the F/G train (8 stops from Manhattan).  Perfect for families, couples, and joy-seeking humans of all kinds. A recently renovated pre-war building. Tile kitchen and bathroom. Hardwood floors. A large, comfy master bedroom with smaller kid's bedroom that has two beds. There are toys and a bassinet for infants (can be removed otherwise). The backyard is huge and perfect for relaxing, playing, bbqing or flower-gazing. Front and backyard available to guests. Text or call anytime! Windsor Terrace is quiet residential neighborhood nestled lovingly next to Prospect Park. There is a burgeoning commercial district with new restaurants/shops/bars opening everyday. Prospect Park has everything--a zoo, baseball fields, a splash park, birds, trees, drum circles, angry squirrels , happy squirrels, sunbathers, summer concerts, bike paths, surly teenagers on skateboards, ducks, bbq
neighborhood_overview: Windsor Terrace is quiet residential neighborhood nestled lovingly next to Prospect Park. There is a burgeoning commercial district with new restaurants/shops/bars opening everyday. Prospect Park has everything--a zoo, baseball fields, a splash park, birds, trees, drum circles, angry squirrels , happy squirrels, sunbathers, summer concerts, bike paths, surly teenagers on skateboards, ducks, bbq grills, nature.
transit: The F/G train is right around the corner. The F will get you to Manhattan in 20-30 minutes. There are also buses nearby that can get you anywhere in Brooklyn.
access: Front and backyard available to guests.
interaction: Text or call anytime!
house_rules: No noise in the backyard past 10 to be considerate of our neighbors. No pets.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: From upstate New York.  Small biz owner in Brooklyn.

reviews.comments: Love, love and love.  Stayed with my 4 year old daughter and my parents.  Great location,  Italian ice place right around the corner next to a great playground right in the beautiful prospect park. Great mix of the old charm Brooklyn with a touch of hipness.  Great for family.  Definitely will stay again next time.

This was as "perfect" of an experience that I could think of.  This was the first time I've booked an online vacation rental with AirBnB.  
This house was just as described and was perfect for our family with small children.  The location was ideal.  We were a half block from Prospect Park, local brooklyn pizza and italian ice, and a block from the subway.  Their home was clean and inviting.  I loved the back yard and felt very safe in the neighborhood.  
The hosts were outstanding from the very beginning.  They called me and provided directions and feedback and followed up after check-in to see if I needed anything.  I felt like I knew the hosts and had a comfort level with them.  I would DEFINETELY stay here again when traveling to the Brooklyn/NYC area.

We had such a great stay at Seryn's home! Her response time on every communication was immediate and helpful. We felt so welcomed in their family home. The house is in a beautiful walking neighborhood just down the street from Prospect Park and the F train into Manhattan
it was the perfect location for myself the other mom and our 3 teen boys going in and out of the city. The house is so charming and comfortable, we all felt so at home! I hope to have the chance to stay there again my next time in NYC - thank you so much you guys!
The place was great. A perfect place to explore Brooklyn. Also really great for families with small children. Really close to the park. Seryn was really helpful getting us checked in.

We had a great stay at Seryn's apartment. The place is very comfortable and beautifully furnished, and Seryn was very easy and accommodating to work with. Also, it's ideally situated in terms of multiple factors: nearby restaurants and shops, Prospect Park, and the subway. We would definitely rent it again.

Seryn's apartment was just what we needed for our trip back to Brooklyn.  Traveling with three kids can be a challenge, so it was great to arrive and find the place clean and perfectly ready for us. Seryn did a wonderful job staying in touch and answering our questions.  And it was great to be near our favorite playground in Brooklyn.

The place was excellent! Great location--right by Prospect Park, and the F Train to NYC. Apartment was clean, with plenty of space, good shower, and a big yard. Also the kids room was adorable--if you have kids I would especially recommend staying here. We never actually met Seryn in person, but she was very nice, communicative, and helpful--quick to respond to what few questions we had. We also went to several of the places recommended and they too were lovely. I highly recommend the pizzas at Le Paddock. Two thumbs up!!
Great neighborhood.  Host was very responsive.

My family and I had a truly delightful stay here!   This is an ideal apartment for a small family with young children.   We very much enjoyed the charming neighborhood and proximity to Prospect Park.  

Seryn was a great host.  Everything was well prepared for us and she was great and prompt about communication. 

We would gladly stay here again.

We had a great stay at Seryn's place. My sister was there with my nephew and found the space to be incredibly kid friendly. Seryn's place was our home base for my wedding at the Picnic House and thanks to her wonderful space and her neighbors (!!) we were able to arrange all flowers in the yard, have kids entertained at the nearby playground and park. It was such a wonderful experience! Thank you, Seryn!
Staying at Seryn's was like staying at home.  Great neighborhood.

The host was very welcoming and helpful before and during our stay.  The   house was just as described and was very charming and comfortable, a very lovely home.  Our young children also loved it and we all had plenty of room to have a nice relaxed weekend.  A very fun playground was just blocks away and it was in a perfect location to all the things we planned to do around Prospect Park.  We would highly recommend staying here to enjoy real Brooklyn living.  It was a very relaxing place to comeback to after a day around the busy city.
This home is clean and cozy. Located just off the park, close to fantastic crepes and a large playground. The F train is also very close. A home away from home!

This was a lovely apartment in a perfect Brooklyn location, with the subway, a beautiful park and plenty of food options around the corner. Seryn and her husband were responsive when needed and have created a great, easy space for guests, including kids.

This was our first time staying in someone's home, rather than an apartment kept for rental, and though it was a little weird at first we quickly grew to love it. Seryn's home is cosy and warm, small but feels spacious because of the clever use of the layout. It was perfect for a family with small children. Its location is ideal, right by Prospect Park, as well as some great cafes and stores. The kitchen has everything you could need, and is beautiful too. We had a really nice stay here, and would recommend. The only minus was that the blinds let the light in. Seryn answered all my queries quickly and in a very friendly way. Great find, a lovely home.
Great location in a relatively quiet neighborhood with easy access to prospect park, subway, restaurants. Seryn's home was perfect for our family. Thanks for a great stay!

Seryn was a perfect host, helpful and accommodating. The apartment was great for my husband, myself, and our two kids (ages 8 & 10), in a family-friendly neighborhood, and with a subway station just a couple of blocks away. We would love to stay here again.
This was a terrific place that I would certainly stay in again. The host was kind, welcoming, and accommodating. Highly recommend!

The home was well decorated and equipped for a family. We definitely felt comfortable and like we were staying at a cozy home and not a place where someone was housing their surplus furniture. There was even a piano, toys, and books for our girls (6 and 9). The location was convenient to the park/playground and cute eateries which we didn't get to all try yet. We'll most likely be back. Thanks for a great stay!

Centrally located, very spacious and comfortable family style apartment in a quiet residential area and within very easy walking distance of the subway and Prospect Park, and has the added bonus of a back garden. Very close to all the amenities in Brooklyn. Seryn could not have been more helpful with her communications and advice. Highly recommended.
We loved our stay! Kids loved yard, bunk beds, playground, and toys. We loved that it was a beautiful place to stay, quiet, and great communication with Seryn.

Seryn went out of her way to make our stay wonderful. To say she was the consummate host would be an understatement--she was communicative, kind, thoughtful, generous with our kids, inviting, funny, aware, and understanding. The location is amazing, especially for families--easy access to the train, the highway, the park, and ice cream. No trouble parking, either. The apartment was clean and very well taken care of, and there were lots of toys and stuffed animals. Our kids did not want to leave!
Great place to stay! Highly recommend it.

We loved our stay at Seryn's place. It's a block from the subway, several restaurants and Prospect Park are a block away, yet the house feels like it's in a small town or even the countryside (chickens in the neighbor's backyard will do that). We recommend it highly.

Seryn was a fabulous host. Her place is well-equipped, and for a family traveling with children, you cannot beat it. It was wonderful to be able to step right into an actual home, supplied with toys, beds, stroller, sandbox, and anything else a family might want. Brooklyn has always been a special place for us, but if we had chosen to stay anywhere else, it would not have been the same. After being out and about all day, it was a perfect place to decompress and let our kids recoup from the heat of the day. My husband and I had some great down time watching Netflix -- something we can never do at home -- and Seryn was completely open to sharing everything with us. She made our stay absolutely lovely -- a dream vacation. You can also not beat the location -- right next to the subway, wonderful Prospect Park, and many delicious restaurants. Thank you, Seryn!

La casa tiene un jardin precioso, un gran parque cerca para los niños y el metro al lado. 
Ideal para ir con niños de hasta 8 años. Con hijos más mayores hay poca intimidad. 
Seryn es super amable y servicial.

Superbe endroit où rester plusieurs jours! Nous étions 2 adultes, 2 adolescentes et un bambin et il y avait suffisamment de place pour tous le monde. Situé à deux pas du métro, mais prévoir 40 minutes minimum pour aller à Manhattan. La cour arrière est très intime et agréable pour prendre un repas en tout temps.

We didn't met Seryn but she always answered promptly to all our questions. The accomodation (our floor) is perfect for family with young children and well located near Prospect Park. Our children were very happy. We definitively recommend it. Thank you Seryn and to your family !

Nous avons été très bien reçu chez Seryn. L'appartement est très propre, bien situé (près du métro ligne F) et le stationnement est facile. Seryn est une hôte qui se préoccupe du bien de ses invités. neighborhood_overview: “A ilha do Porto" is a working-class neighborhood, very different from that of other industrial cities, which first appeared in the eastern part of the city of Porto (Campanhã) in the late 19th century, with the arrival of many migrants from the northern lands from the country The bourgeois houses were built at one end of the land, and the proprietor opened a link through a narrow corridor to the back of the yard with a street connection, along which he built small, precarious housing to house whole families. The Oporto living house is one of those old bourgeois houses, totally restored and where you can see “as ilhas" as living quarters, contrary to the cold and impersonal spirit that increasingly defines the current life In Porto, more than a thousand of these neighborhoods ("ilhas") are scattered throughout the city.
notes: Cars can be parked for free on the street of the apartment, but if you wish, you have an underground park with surveillance only 2 minutes walk, with a maximum payment of 10 euros, for 24 hours of 10 euros.
transit: Metro Campanhã metro station located 1 minute walk from the development with access to any point of the city in minutes: -	City center (Bolhão) 6 minutes -	Old town and river (S. Bento) 10 minutes -	Airport (direct) 30 minutes Train Main train station of Porto (Campanhã) located 2 minutes, on foot, with access to all the country. You can visit the main beaches and towns of the region easily, entering and leaving at the house door Bus Main bus interface to most destinations in the city located 1 minute walk
access: Access to the apartment is fully done with digital code provided directly to the guest, simplifying check-in
interaction: I leave my guests freely, but I am available whenever they need me

Yasminn is French-Austrian lady that works in Lisbon in a luxury hotel as a Guest Relations Manager but lived her whole life in the Caribbean island of Anguilla. She still prefers Porto though!

David is Portuguese, works as a Business Development manager at a property management company. He is born and raised in the beautiful city of Porto and he is very excited to welcome you to their home!

We love to travel and to host people!

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
David and Yasminn how  lucky we fell to have been able to find your property on Airbnb. It was way above and beyond our expectations. Not only the flat was very clean, chic and cosy but the location was perfect. Right in the heart of Porto, walking distance to all top attractions. The private garden patio It’s amazing. Romantic and cozy!, perfect for a glass of “your “ wine .
We will definitely reach out again when come back to Porto!

Greeeat place in dowtown Porto, with a beautiful urban terrace and stylish yet cozy vibe. 
Awesome places to eat or go for sangria right around the corner. 
Can’t wait to visit again!

The apartment was absolutely perfect. Spotless clean, has all the comfort you can think of and is styled with an amazing eye for detail. The apartment is fully equipped with all the things to make it feel like it's your home away from home as it even has Netflix and a film projector! 

I also doubt if there is any better location possible in Porto. 

- A supermarket at not even a 3 minute walk
- Some of the best restaurants and lunch places in the area
- The biggest train stations on a walking distance (Trindade & São Bento) 
- Some of the best bars/clubs just 2 streets away (in case you want to party)
- All the top attractions including the Ribera and the Douro river on a walking distance

And last but not least the hospitality was a 5-star. I was warmly welcomed by a friend of them (Diogo) as he even walked me to the nearest supermarket just to make sure I would find it. During my stay David checked up on me frequently in case I had any questions he could help me with.

 I would definitely recommend it and come back one day !
Buenísima ubicación, precioso piso, con mucho gusto y de alta calidad. Muy recomendable.

La experiencia ha sido genial. El alojamiento de 10, todo perfecto. La ubicación, no es que estuviese cerca del centro es que era el centro. Y la atencion de sus dueños inmejorable. Es el mejor sitio posible para pasar unos dias en Oporto.

The apartment is beautiful and brand-new. Very cosy and with a great deco. The hosts were always available and checked upon us regularly to ensure that we were having a great time (loved the welcome touches). You can’t get more central than this, the apartment is literally in the best location possible which was a big plus for us!
Muito bom espaço, ótima localização e ótimos inquilinos

Can't recommend this place enough. The location is right in the middle of the city. It's a really cozy, beautiful flat. Also, David and Yasminn are so kind and welcoming that you couldn't ask for anything more.
Espaço agradável, muito central. Limpo. Anfitriões disponíveis para os nossos pedidos com respostas rápidas. Uma boa opção na cidade do Porto.
David was a perfect host, super kind and helpful. The place is amazing, comfy and clean. Perfect location nearby every attraction of the city.

The location is perfect, can reach many good restaurants and attractions within 5 min walk, can't be more city centre. The host organized everything well and responded quickly once you have any question. Strongly recommend~

name: Chambre privée à Montréal
summary: CETTE ANNONCE EST POUR NON FUMEUR. La chambre se trouve au sous sol d'une jolie maison victorienne qui a beaucoup de cachet tout près du merveilleux parc de la visitation . Piste cyclable, randonnée sur le bord de la rivière, ski de fond. Accès à la cuisine et aux machines à laver et à sécher.Literie. Internet. Autobus. Stationnement.
